S04bsu018_u:219: sa pūrvapraṇidhānena candrottamena tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena vyākṛtaḥ /
S04bsu018_u:220: “bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ kulaputra mama parinirvṛtasya daśābhyantarakalpān saddharmaḥ sthāsyati /

S04bsu018_u:223: padmottaro nāma bhaviṣyasi tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasampanno yāvadbuddho bhagavāṃs” /
S04bsu018_u:224: tatkālaṃ te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā yena candrottamastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho bhagavāṃstenopajagmuḥ,

S04bsu018_u:226: tathāgatasya pūjāṃ kṛtvā triskṛtvaśca pradakṣiṇīkṛtvā bhagavantametadavocan - “icchāmo vayam bhadanta bhagavan nime daśābhyantarakalpā nirodhamavahitena cittenātināmayituṃ” /
S04bsu018_u:227_0: tatra khalu kulaputra candrottamastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho gaganamudraṃ bodhisattvam
S04bsu018_u:228: ye caitarhi daśasu dikṣu sarvalokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantastiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti te 'pi buddho bhagavanto yauvarājyābhiṣiktānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ deśayanti,
S04bsu018_u:229: ye 'pi te bhaviṣyantyanāgate 'dhvani buddhā bhagavantaste 'pi yauvarājyābhiṣiktānāṃ bodhisattvānāmimaṃ sarvajñatākāradhāraṇīmukhapraveśaṃ deśayiṣyanti / tadyathā;

S04bsu018_u:255_2: calitā pracalitā saṃpracalitā kṣubhitā prakṣubhitā saṃprakṣubhitā garjitā pragarjitā saṃpragarjitā,
S04bsu018_u:257: tathārūpaścāvabhāsaḥ prādurbhūtaḥ yaddaśasu dikṣu gaṇanāsamatikrāntā gaṅgānadīvālikāsamā lokadhātavaḥ udāreṇāvabhāsena sphuṭā babhūva /
S04bsu018_u:258: naiva tasmin samaye sumerucakravāḍamahācakravāḍaḥ cakṣuṣa ābhāsamāgacchanti /
S04bsu018_u:259: daśasu dikṣu gaṇanāsamātikrāntā lokadhātavaḥ samāpāṇitalajātā saṃdṛśyante /
S04bsu018_u:260: ye 'pi te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā daśasu dikṣu gaṇanāsamatikrāntāsu lokadhātuṣu prativasanti,
S04bsu018_u:262: te tathāgatabalena svakasvakeṣu buddhakṣetreṣvantarhitā imāṃ sahāṃ lokadhātumāgatvā gṛdhrakūṭe parvate bhagavataḥ sakāśam upasaṃkrāntā,
S04bsu018_u:263: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā nānāprakārairvividhairbodhisattvavikurvitairbhagavataḥ pūjāṃ kṛtvā tatraiva niṣeduḥ sarvajñatākāradhāraṇīmukhapraveśaśravaṇārthaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:265: yena gṛdhrakūṭaḥ parvato yena ca bhagavāṃstenopajagmuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:268: ye cātra bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sannipatitāste sarve padmāṃ buddhakṣetraṃ paśyanti sma,
S04bsu018_u:269: padmottaraṃ ca tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ mahatā bodhisattvagaṇena parivṛtaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:270: samanantarodāhṛtasya cāsya bhagavatā sarvajñatākāradhāraṇīmukhapraveśasya dvāsaptabhirgaṅgānadīvālikāsamairbodhisattvairmahāsattvairiyaṃ dhāraṇī pratilabdhā,
S04bsu018_u:271: dhāraṇīpratilabdhāśca te bodhisattvā daśasu dikṣu gaṇanāsamatikrāntān lokadhātusthān buddhān bhagavataḥ paśyanti sma,
S04bsu018_u:273: āścaryaprāptāste samādhibalena bodhisattvavikurvitena ca buddhapūjāṃ kṛtvā tasthuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:274: bhagavāṃstān evam āha - “imaṃ kulaputra sarvajñatākāradhāraṇīmukhapraveśaṃ bodhisattvo
S04bsu018_u:279: pratilabdho bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāmaitrīṃ pratilabhate mahākaruṇāṃ pratilabhate /
S04bsu018_u:280: kevalamasya samādheḥ pratilābhāya bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣān dharmān avabudhyate sarvajñajñānaṃ ca pratilabhate /
S04bsu018_u:282: imāṃ ca dhāraṇīṃ svabhāvena buddhvā buddhā bhagavantaḥ sattvānāṃ dharmāṃ deśayanti,
S04bsu018_u:284: paśyata kulaputrāsyāḥ sarvajñatākāradhāraṇīmukhapraveśāyā dhāraṇyā anubhāvenāyaṃ mahataḥ pṛthivīcālasya prādurbhūtaḥ,
S04bsu018_u:288: ye ceha sahāyāṃ lokadhātāvanantāparyantā devāḥ kāmāvacarā rūpāvacarā nāgā yakṣāsuramanuṣyāmanuṣyā vā imāṃ sarvajñatākāradhāraṇīmukhapraveśaṃ śroṣyanti,
S04bsu018_u:290: likhamānaścāvirahito bhavati buddhadarśanena dharmaśravaṇena saṅghopasthānena yāvadanuttareṇa parinirvāṇena; (KpSū 29)
S04bsu018_u:291: svādhyāyamānaśca bodhisattva imaṃ sarvajñatākāradhāraṇīmukhapraveśaṃ sarvāṇi gāḍhakarmāṇi niravaśeṣaṃ kṣapayati,
S04bsu018_u:294: yadi tasya bodhisattvasya pañcānantaryāṇi karmāṇi kṛtāṇi syurupacitāṇi tānyapyasya parikṣayaṃ gacchanti,
S04bsu018_u:296: yasya nāstyanantaryāṇi tasya tena janmanā sarvāṇyanyāni karmāṇi niravaśeṣaṃ parikṣayaṃ gacchanti,
S04bsu018_u:298: yo 'pi na bhāvayati na svādhyāyati śṛṇvanaśca dharmabhāṇakasya paṭṭaṃ bandhati,
S04bsu018_u:299: tasya gaṅgānadīvālikāsamā buddhā bhagavantastiṣṭhanto dhriyanto yāpayantaḥ anyalokadhātusthāḥ sādhukāramanupradāsyanti,
S04bsu018_u:301: na cireṇa cāsau bodhisattvaḥ paṭṭaparityāgena yauvarājye 'bhiṣicyate,
S04bsu018_u:303: evameva yaḥ kaścid gandhena pūjāṃ karoti so 'pi na cireṇānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhigandhasya lābhī bhavati,
S04bsu018_u:306: bhakṣyānnapānaṃ dattvā dharmabhāṇakasyānuttarasya tathāgatāhārasya lābhī bhavati bodhisattvaḥ,
S04bsu018_u:308: yaśca dharmabhāṇakaṃ ratnairācchādayati so 'pyacirāt saptatriṃśatāṃ bodhipākṣikadharmaratnāṇāṃ lābhī bhavati /
S04bsu018_u:309: tadevaṃ mahārthikaḥ kulaputra bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ ayaṃ sarvajñatākāradhāraṇīmukhapraveśaḥ /
S04bsu018_u:312: anena ca sarvajñatākāradhāraṇīmukhapraveśena bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ asaṅgapratibhānatāṃ pratilabhate,
S04bsu018_u:314: ebhiḥ kulaputra sarvajñatākāradhāraṇīmukhapraveśaiścandrottamastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho yadā gaganamudraṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamavādata tathaiva pṛthivīcālo 'bhūt,
S04bsu018_u:316: gaṇanātikrāntāni ca daśasu dikṣu buddhakṣetrāṇyudāreṇāvabhāsena sphuṭānyabhūvan /

S04bsu018_u:322_1: āmantrayate - “abhijānāmyahaṃ kulaputra ye bodhisattvā ekajātipratibaddhāsta imān
S04bsu018_u:322_2: daśāntarakalpān nirodhām avahitena cetasā viharitvāvaśiṣṭā bodhisattvā asya gaganamudrasya
S04bsu018_u:323_0: imān daśāntarakalpān dharmaṃ śrutvā daśasu dikṣu teṣu gaṇanāsamatikrānteṣu buddhakṣetreṣu
S04bsu018_u:323_1: teṣāṃ gaṇanātikrāntānāṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ dhriyatāṃ yāpayatāṃ bhagavatāmantike cittamabhiprasādya
S04bsu018_u:325: daśānāmantarakalpānām atyayena gaganamudro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttaraṃ dhārmikaṃ dharmacakraṃ pravartayiṣyati?” /
S04bsu018_u:327: eṣām daśānām antarakalpānāmatyayena gaganamudro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyate,
S04bsu018_u:330: tatra yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvastasyāntikāddharmaṃ śroṣyati taṃ dharmaṃ śrutvā kuśalamulānyavaropayitvā,
S04bsu018_u:332: so 'bhisaṃbuddhabodhiṃ dhārmikaṃ dharmacakraṃ pravaracakraṃ avaivartikacakraṃ pravartayitvā bahubodhisattvakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāvaivartikāṃ sthāpayitvā,
S04bsu018_u:333: ye bodhisattvā iha daśāntarakalpān tasya sakāśādimaṃ sarvajñatākāradhāraṇīmukhapraveśaṃ dharmaṃ deśāmānaṃ śroṣyanti te tasmin samaye dharmaṃ śrutvā ekajātipratibaddhā bhaviṣyanti,
S04bsu018_u:334: ye tu kalpaṃ śroṣyanti te bodhisattvāstasmin samaye bhūmimavakramiṣyanti,
S04bsu018_u:337: tasminneva samaye imāṃ dhāraṇīṃ paryantato lapsyante” ityuktvā,
S04bsu018_u:338: candrottamastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ vividhāni buddhaviṣayaprātihāryāṇi saṃdarśayitvā,
S04bsu018_u:339: gaganamudrasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya nārāyaṇaṃ samādhiṃ nidarśayitvā,
S04bsu018_u:345: yena bodhyāsane supravartitadharmacakro bodhisattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati,
S04bsu018_u:347: yena dharmacakraṃ pravartayamāno bahuprāṇakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi avaivartikāṃ sthāpayati /
S04bsu018_u:348_1: bodhisattvasaṅghena bhagavatāḥ pūjāṃ kṛtvā svakasvakeṣu kūṭāgāreṣu praviśya sthitāścandrottamo
S04bsu018_u:349: ca bodhisattvāstasyāmeva rātryāmatyayāt tasya bhagavataḥ śarīre pūjāṃ kṛtvā svakasvakeṣu kūṭāgāreṣu praviśanti sma /
S04bsu018_u:351: ye ca tatra bodhisattvā ekajātipratibaddhāste nirodhasamādhānenaitān daśāntarakalpān atināmayanti /
S04bsu018_u:352: gaganamudro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhisattvān mahāsattvān ārabhya dharmaṃ deśayati,
S04bsu018_u:353: teṣāṃ ca bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ daśāntarakalpān kuśalamūlānyavaropitavān /
S04bsu018_u:358: asmin khalu punaḥ sarvajñatākāradhāraṇīmukhapraveśe bhāṣyamāṇe aśītīnāṃ bodhisattvanayutaśatasahasrāṇām anutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntipratilabdhā,
S04bsu018_u:363: atha khalu ratnacandravairocano bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - “katamairbhadanta bhagavan dharmaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattva imāṃ dhāraṇīṃ pratilabhate?” /
S04bsu018_u:364: bhagavān āha - “caturbhiḥ kulaputra dharmaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattva imāṃ dhāraṇīṃ pratilabhate /
S04bsu018_u:368: , iha bodhisattvo mahāsattva itaretareṇa cīvareṇa saṃtuṣṭo bhavati /
S04bsu018_u:375: asmin prathame āryavaṃśe vyavasthito bhavati bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ /
S04bsu018_u:377: punaraparaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattva itaretareṇa glānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāreṇa saṃtuṣṭo bhavati /
S04bsu018_u:381: pratilabdhvāraktaḥ paribhuṅkte 'gṛddho hyagrathito 'mūrcchito 'navadhyavasito 'nadhyavasānamāpanna ādīnavadarśī niḥsaraṇaṃ prajānaṃ paribhuṅkte /
S04bsu018_u:383: ebhiścaturbhirdharmaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattva imāṃ dhāraṇīṃ pratilabhate bhāvayati ca /
S04bsu018_u:384: aparaiḥ pañcabhirdharmaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattva imāṃ sarvajñatākāradhāraṇīmukhapraveśadhāraṇīṃ pratilabhate /
S04bsu018_u:386: , iha bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ātmanā śīlavāṃ viharati,
S04bsu018_u:390: parānapi śīlavirahitāṃ dṛṣṭvā śīlasaṃpade samādāpayati vinayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati;
S04bsu018_u:391: anena prathamena dharmaṇa samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ /
S04bsu018_u:392: punaraparaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ dṛṣṭivyasanagatāṃ sattvāṃ mithyādṛṣṭyāṃ vyutthāpya samyagdṛṣṭyāṃ samādāpayati vinayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati;
S04bsu018_u:395: punaraparaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nācāravyasanagatāṃ sattvān samyagācāre samādāpayati vinayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati;
S04bsu018_u:396: anena tṛtīyena dharmeṇa samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ /
S04bsu018_u:397: punaraparam āśayavipannān sattvān āśayasaṃpattau samādāpayati vinayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati;
S04bsu018_u:398: anena caturtheṇa dharmeṇa samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ /
S04bsu018_u:399: punaraparaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhayāne saṃprasthitān sattvān anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpayati vinayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati;
S04bsu018_u:400: anena pañcamena dharmeṇa samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ /
S04bsu018_u:401: ebhiḥ pañcabhirdharmaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattva imāṃ dhāraṇīṃ pratilabhate /
S04bsu018_u:402: aparaiḥ ṣaḍbhirdharmaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattva imāṃ dhāraṇīṃ pratilabhate /

S04bsu018_u:600: yad api yuṣmākaṃ paudgalikaṃ upabhogaparibhogopasthānaparicaryāntaḥpuraṃ gauraveṇa tatsarvaṃ bhagavato niryātayata bhikṣusaṅghasya ca” /
S04bsu018_u:603: tasmin nevodyāne bhagavato 'rthāya kūṭāgāraṃ māpayati saptaratnamayaṃ samantataḥ caturdiśaṃ cātra saptaratnamayāni dvārāṇi māpayati sma /
S04bsu018_u:611: tad api cakraratnaṃ bahiḥ kūṭāgārasya bhagavata evābhimukhaṃ puruṣamātrapramāṇamuparyantarīkṣe sthitaṃ jvalati /
S04bsu018_u:613: bhagavataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ sthitvā bhagavata upari ratnavṛkṣaṃ dhārayati /
S04bsu018_u:614: sa ca vṛkṣo 'laṅkṛtaḥ saptabhī ratnairnānāvidhaiśca muktāhārairvicitraiścābharaṇairnānāvidhaiśca mālyairnānāraṅgaiśca paṭṭairnānāvidhaiśca duṣyairuparacitaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:616: yā cāraṇemino rājño 'gramahiṣī sā bhagavataḥ purataḥ sthitā,
S04bsu018_u:619: tataḥ svayameva bhagavataḥ purataḥ sthāpayāṃ āsa /
S04bsu018_u:620: tatastayā maṇiratnābhayā sarvaṃ tadudyānaṃ satatasamitamudāreṇāvabhāsena sphuṭaṃ abhūt,
S04bsu018_u:623: ekaikasya ca śrāvakasya gauśīrṣasyaiva candanasya pādapīṭhaṃ sthāpitaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:624: ekaikasya ca śrāvakasya pṛṣṭhataḥ sarvaśveto hastināgaḥ sthāpita uparyevaṃrūpameva cakraratnaṃ puruṣapramāṇaṃ sthāpitaṃ yathā bhagavatastathā,
S04bsu018_u:625: ekaikasya ca śrāvakasyāgrataḥ sarvālaṅkāravibhūṣitā kanyā sthāpitā gośīrṣoragasāracandanacūrnairavakirati,
S04bsu018_u:628: bahiścodyānasya samantena pariṇāyakaratnaṃ vijahāra sārdhaṃ caturaṅgeṇa balakāyena /
S04bsu018_u:629: atha khalu kulaputra rājāraṇemī divasedivase nagarānniryāti bhagavantaṃ darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya /
S04bsu018_u:630: tasya yāvad yānasya bhūmistāvad yānena yātvā yānād avatīrya padbhyāmevodyānaṃ prāviśat,
S04bsu018_u:631: praviśya yena ratnagarbhastathāgatastenopajagāmopetya ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya pādau śirasābhivandya bhagavantaṃ trīnvārān pradakṣiṇīkṛtvā,
S04bsu018_u:633: svayaṃ ca praṇītena prabhūtena khādanīyabhojanīyena lehyapeyena svahastaṃ (KpSū 58)
S04bsu018_u:635: svahastaṃ saṃtarpayitvā saṃpravārayitvā bhagavataṃ bhuktavantaṃ viditvā dhautahastamapanītapātrapāṇiṃ svayameva vyajanamādāya bhagavantaṃ vījayāmāsa /
S04bsu018_u:636: ekaikasya ca śrāvakasya rājaputrasahasraṃ koṭṭarājasahasraṃ caivaṃrūpamupasthānaṃ kṛtvā vyajanaṃ gṛhītvā śrāvakān vījayati sma /
S04bsu018_u:638: gaganatale cānekairdevakoṭīnayutaśatasahasraiḥ puṣpavṛṣṭirabhivṛṣṭā divyāni vādyāni abhivādayanti,
S04bsu018_u:639: divyāni ca chatrāṇi vāsāṃsi ābharaṇāni ca pralambayanti /
S04bsu018_u:640: nīlavāsasaṃ ca yakṣāṇāṃ catvāriṃśacchatasahasrāṇi ye candanadīpāt gośīrṣasya candanasya kāṣṭhānyānayanti,
S04bsu018_u:642: rātrau svayameva rājāraṇemī bhagavataḥ purato bhikṣusaṅghasya cānekāni dīpakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi jvālayati /
S04bsu018_u:643: atha kulaputra rājāraṇemī bhagavataḥ purataḥ sthitvā ekāṃ dīpasthālikāṃ śirasyupasthāpayitvā dvāvaṃśayordvau pāṇyordvau caraṇayordīpasthālīḥ,
S04bsu018_u:647: tadyathāpi nāma tṛtīyadhyānasamāpannasya bhikṣorevamaklāntakāyaḥ aklāntacitto māsatrayaṃ bhagavantamupasthitavān /
S04bsu018_u:648: evaṃ sahasraṃ rājāputrāṇāṃ caturaśītiśca koṭṭarājasahasrāṇi anyāni ca prāṇakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi,
S04bsu018_u:650: yathā rājāraṇemī ratnagarbhan tathāgatamupasthitavān tathāgramahiṣī devī māsatrayaṃ gandhapuspairupasthitavatī /
S04bsu018_u:652: atha khalu kulaputra rājāraṇemī trayāṇāṃ māsānāmatyayena caturaśītiṃ jāmbūnadamayāni niṣkasahasrāṇi bhagavato niryātayati /
S04bsu018_u:653: cakraratnacakrapūrvaṃgamāni ca suvarṇamayāni caturaśītiścakraratnasahasrāṇi bhagavato niryātayati /
S04bsu018_u:656: maṇiratnapūrvaṃgamāni caturaśītiḥ sūryakāntimaṇisahasrāṇi bhagavato niryātayati sma /
S04bsu018_u:659: upasthānāya pariṇāyakaratnapūrvaṃgamāni caturaśītikoṭṭarājasahasrāṇi bhagavata upasthānāya niryātayati sma /
S04bsu018_u:660: añcuranagarapūrvaṃgamāni caturaśītinagarasahasrāṇi bhagavata upajīvyāni niryātayati bhikṣusaṅghasya ca /
S04bsu018_u:661_1: chatrasahasrāṇi caturaśītyudārāṇāṃ rājārhanāṃ vastrāṇāṃ sahasrāṇi caturaśītisahasrāṇi
S04bsu018_u:662: ratnamayāḥ śakunā ratnamayāśca mṛgāścaturaśītivyajanasahasrāṇi bhagavato niryātayati sma /
S04bsu018_u:663: caturaśītirasāyanasahasrāṇi ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya niryātayati sma /
S04bsu018_u:668: punarapyahaṃ bhagavantamupasaṃkramiṣye darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya ca” /
S04bsu018_u:669_0: (KpSū 61) yacca rājño 'raṇeminaḥ putrasahasraṃ bhagavataḥ pādayornipatya bhagavantamekaikamidamavocat
S04bsu018_u:671: teṣāṃ adhivāsitaṃ bhagavatā viditvātha rājāraṇemī bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya bhikṣusaṅghaṃ ca triskṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavanto 'ntikāt prakāntaḥ /
S04bsu018_u:672: atha teṣāṃ rājaputrāṇāṃ jyeṣṭho 'nimiṣo nāmā bhagavantaṃ traimāsamevaṃrūpeṇopasthānenopastiṣṭhati bhikṣusaṅghaṃ ca,
S04bsu018_u:673: tadyathā rājāraṇemī tathaivamanimiṣapramukhaṃ rājakumārasahasraṃ dinedine bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāmati bhikṣusaṅghaṃ ca dharmaṃ ca śrotuṃ /
S04bsu018_u:674: atha kulaputra bhagavato ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya pitā samudrareṇurnāma brāhmaṇaḥ,
S04bsu018_u:675: sa sarvaṃ jambūdvīpamanvāhiṇḍya strīpuruṣadārakadārikābhyaḥ piṇḍapātaṃ yācate,
S04bsu018_u:676: sa taṃ piṇḍapātaṃ parigṛhītastaṃ sarvaṃ jambūdvīpanivāsilokaṃ triśaraṇagamane pratiṣṭhāpayati,
S04bsu018_u:679: 'sti yaḥ samudrareṇunā brāhmaṇena piṇḍakena na parigṛhīto,
S04bsu018_u:682: yo vā nānuttare jñāne samādāpito na pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ /
S04bsu018_u:685: animiṣo 'pi rājakumāro bhagavantaṃ māsatrayamevaṃrūpeṇopasthānenopasthitavān sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṅghena yathā rājñāraṇeminā,
S04bsu018_u:686_0: so 'pi trayāṇāṃ māsānāmatyayena caturaśītiścakraratnasahasrāṇi niryātayati sarvasauvarṇāni
S04bsu018_u:688: ekaikaśaścaturaśītisahasrāṇi bhagavato niryātitavanta evaṃ bhikṣusaṅghasya ca /
S04bsu018_u:690: atha sa rājakumāro bhagavantaṃ kṣamāpitavān bhikṣusaṅghaṃ ca,
S04bsu018_u:691: animiṣo rājakumāro bhagavantamevaṃrūpeṇopasthānenopasthitavān sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṅghena yathā rājñāraṇeminā tathaiva dakṣiṇā dattā anantā /
S04bsu018_u:692: evamindragaṇena māsatrayaṃ bhagavān upasthito vibhavaśca parityaktaḥ,
S04bsu018_u:739: yāvad araṇemino rājñaḥ putrasahasreṇa ekaikena ratnagarbhastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ (KpSū 64)
S04bsu018_u:741: evaṃrūpeṇa bhagavata upasthānenopasthitaḥ cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārairmāsatrayaṃ yathā jyeṣṭhena rājaputreṇa,
S04bsu018_u:742: tathaivaikaikaścaturaśītiḥ svarṇamayāścakrasahasrāṇi vistareṇa yāvaccaturaśītirasāyanasahasrāṇi bhagavato niryātitāni bhikṣusaṅghasya ca /
S04bsu018_u:743_0: evaṃrūpeṇa mahāprasādena praṇidhānaṃ kṛtvā kecid devatvaṃ kecicchakratvaṃ kecin māratvaṃ
S04bsu018_u:743_1: keciccakravartirājyaṃ kecin mahābhogatāṃ kecicchrāvakayānaṃ kecit pratyekabuddhayānaṃ prārthayanti,
S04bsu018_u:744: adhiṣṭhamānāśca dvau varṣaśatau pañcapañcāśacca varṣāṇi bhagavantaṃ kṣamāpayanti (KpSū 65)
S04bsu018_u:746: tatkāle samudrareṇurbrāhmano 'grapurohito 'bhyāgato 'drākṣīt taṃ bhagavantaṃ tai rājaputrairupasthitaṃ dṛṣṭvā saptavarṣāṇi sarvopakaraṇairupanimantrayate,
S04bsu018_u:749: atha samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇa evaṃrūpeṇa sarvopakaraṇasaṃpannenopasthānena bhagavata upasthitaḥ cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayyāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraiḥ sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṅghena //
S04bsu018_u:751: atha khalu kulaputrāpareṇa samayena samudrareṇorbrāhmaṇasyaivaṃ cetasaḥ parivitarka udapādi /
S04bsu018_u:754: kim ayaṃ prārthayati devatvaṃ vā uta śakratvaṃ vā māratvaṃ vā mahābhogatāṃ vā śrāvakayānaṃ vā pratyekabuddhayānaṃ vānuttarāṃ vā samyaksaṃbodhim ākāṅkṣate /
S04bsu018_u:759_0: kaccit svapne nivedayatu devo vā yakṣo vā nāgo vā buddho vā śrāvako vā brāhmaṇo vā
S04bsu018_u:759_1: kin tāvad rājā devaśriyaṃ kāṅkṣate uta manuṣyaśriyaṃ atha śrāvakatvamatha pratyekabuddhabhūmimatha
S04bsu018_u:760: atha kulaputra samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇaḥ agrapurohitaḥ svapne tathārūpamavabhāsamadrākṣīt,
S04bsu018_u:761: yenāvabhāsena daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu buddhakṣetreṣu buddhān bhagavataḥ paśyati /
S04bsu018_u:762: te ca buddhā bhagavantaḥ tasya brāhmaṇasya padmāni svarṇapatrāṇi rūpyadaṇḍāni vaiḍūryakarṇikāni aśmagarbhakeśarāṇi preṣayanti /
S04bsu018_u:763: sarveṣu ca teṣu padmeṣu sūryamaṇḍalaṃ dṛśyate /
S04bsu018_u:765: ekaikasmācca sūryamaṇḍalāt ṣaṣṭiraśmikoṭyo niścerustā raśmayaḥ sarvāstasya brāhmaṇasya vaktre praviśanti /
S04bsu018_u:767: svakāyasya ca kukṣau ṣaṣṭibodhisattvakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi padmeṣu paryaṅkopaviṣṭāṃ dhyāyamānāṃ paśyati /
S04bsu018_u:772: tebhyaśca padmebhyo divyānyatikrāntamānuṣāṇi tūryāṇi niścaranti śṛṇoti ca /
S04bsu018_u:774: rudhiramrakṣitena kāyena dhāvantaṃ sūkaramukhena vividhān bahuprāṇino bhakṣayante,
S04bsu018_u:776: vividhāśca prāṇinaḥ samāgamya taṃ rājānaṃ bhakṣayanti yāvad asthiśaṅkalāvaśeṣaṃ kṛtvā chorayanti /
S04bsu018_u:777: evaṃ punaḥ punastathaiva prādurbhavantaṃ sūkaramukhaṃ rudhiramrakṣitena kāyena bahuvidhān prāṇino bhakṣayitvā eraṇḍamūle niṣaṇṇaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:779: punaraparaṃ rājaputrān paśyati sūkaramukhenāpare gajamukhenāpare mahiṣamukhenāpare siṃhamukhenāpare vṛkamukhenāpare śṛgālamukhenāpare śvamukhenāpare markaṭamukhena paśyati,
S04bsu018_u:780: śoṇitābhyukṣitagātrānanekavidhān prāṇino bhakṣayitvā eraṇḍavṛkṣamūle niṣaṇṇān vividhaiḥ prāṇibhirbhakṣyamāṇān asthiśaṅkalāvaśiṣṭānutsṛṣṭān /
S04bsu018_u:781: punarapi tenaiva kāyena sthitān tathaiva prāṇino bhakṣayataḥ paśyati /
S04bsu018_u:786: bhāgaṃ kṛtvā tataḥ prathamaṃ rājñaḥ saṃvibhāgamekaṃ padmamanuprayaccha,
S04bsu018_u:792: atha sa brāhmaṇaḥ padmāni bhājayamāna eva pratibuddhaḥ,
S04bsu018_u:794_0: “hīnapraṇidhirayaṃ rājā cakravartī saṃsārasukhābhirato hīnā vāsyādhimuktiḥ sārdhamekatyai
S04bsu018_u:794_1: rājaputrairekatyāḥ punā rājaputrāḥ śrāvakayānamākāṅkṣanti ye mayā mahiṣarathābhirūḍhā
S04bsu018_u:796: yacca mayādhatriyāṃ varṣaśatāṃ jambūdvīpamanvāhiṇḍya sarvasattvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau yāvat pratiṣṭhāpiṭāḥ /
S04bsu018_u:797: tad evaṃ mayā sarvajambūdvīpe gatānekāni prāṇakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi triṣu puṇyakriyāvastuṣu samādāpitāni niveśitāni pratiṣṭhāpitāni /
S04bsu018_u:798: tasyaitannimittaṃ yena mayā svapne mahāvabhāso dṛṣṭaḥ (KpSū 69)
S04bsu018_u:800_0: yacca mayā sarvaṃ jambūdvīpamanvāhiṇḍya strīpuruṣadārakadārikābhyaḥ piṇḍapātaṃ yācayitvā
S04bsu018_u:800_1: bahuprāṇakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi triśaraṇakriyāvastuṣu sthāpitāni vinītāni niveśitāni pratiṣṭhāpitāni /
S04bsu018_u:801: yacca mayā tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ saptavarṣāṇyupanimantritaḥ sarvopakaraṇaiḥ sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṅghena,
S04bsu018_u:802: tena mama daśabhyo digbhyaḥ anyebhyo buddhakṣetrebhyaḥ buddhairbhagavadbhiḥ padmānyanupreṣitāni /
S04bsu018_u:804: tena te buddhā saptaratnamayāni chatrāṇi visarjayanti /
S04bsu018_u:809: yacca kukṣau bodhisattvakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi padmeṣu paryaṅkaniṣaṇṇāni dhyāyamānāni,
S04bsu018_u:811: yacca me śakrabrahmalokapāla dṛṣṭā ājñāpayantīmāni padmāni bhāgaṃ kuru,
S04bsu018_u:812: yacca mayā tāni padmāni bhāgaṃ kṛtvā dattāni /
S04bsu018_u:813: yannvaham imāḥ svapnā buddhāya bhagavata ākhyāsye,
S04bsu018_u:817: atha samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇaḥ tasyā eva rātryā atyayena bhojanaṃ sajjīkṛtvā kālyate eva yena bhagavāṃstenopajagāma,
S04bsu018_u:818: upetya svayameva bhagavato hastaśaucamupanāmayati bhikṣusaṅghasya ca /
S04bsu018_u:819: hastaśaucamupanīya prabhūtena khādanīyena bhojanīyena svahastaṃ saṃtarpayati saṃpravārayati,
S04bsu018_u:820_0: saṃtarpayitvā saṃpravārayitvā bhikṣusaṅghamanekaparyāyena saṃtarpya saṃpravārya bhagavantaṃ
S04bsu018_u:820_1: viditvā bhikṣusaṅghaṃ ca dhautahastamapanītapātraṃ nīcamāsanaṃ gṛhītvā bhagavataḥ
S04bsu018_u:821: atha rājāraṇemī tatraivābhyāgataḥ sārdhaṃ putrasahasreṇānekaiśca prāṇisahasraiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛtaḥ,
S04bsu018_u:822: sa yāvad yānasya bhūmistāvad yānena yātvā yānād avatīrya padbhyāmevārāmaṃ prāvikṣat,
S04bsu018_u:823: praviśya ca yena bhagavāṃstenopajagāmopetya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhikṣusaṅghasya ca bhagavataḥ purataḥ niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya /
S04bsu018_u:824: atha samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇo yathādṛṣṭāṃ svapnāṃ bhagavato nivedayati /
S04bsu018_u:825: bhagavān āha - “yattvaṃ brāhmaṇādrākṣīt mahāntamavabhāsaṃ yenāvabhāsena gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu buddhakṣetreṣu (KpSū 71)
S04bsu018_u:826: buddhā bhagavanto dṛṣṭā tava padmāni visarjayanti,
S04bsu018_u:827: teṣu ca padmeṣu sūryavigrahā dṛṣṭā raśmayaḥ pramuñcamānāste ca raśmayastava mukhe praviśanti /
S04bsu018_u:829: tena tvayā gaṇanātikrāntāḥ sattvāstriṣu puṇyakriyāvastuṣu niveśitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitāśca,
S04bsu018_u:830: gaṇanātikrāntāśca sattvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpitā niveśitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ /
S04bsu018_u:831: yacca tvayā sarvasattvārthaṃ mahāyajñasyārambhaḥ kṛtastena tvaṃ brāhmaṇa buddhā bhagavanto vyākariṣyantyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S04bsu018_u:832: ye daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu lokadhātuṣu tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti dharmaṃ ca deśayanti,
S04bsu018_u:833: yaiśca tava padmāni visarjitāni suvarṇapatrāṇi rūpyadaṇḍāni vaiḍūryakarṇikāni asmagarbhakeśarāṇi,
S04bsu018_u:834: teṣu ca sarveṣu padmeṣu sūryavigrahā dṛśyante /
S04bsu018_u:836: yattvaṃ brāhmaṇādrākṣīt svapne ye daśausu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantastiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti dharmaṃ ca deśayanti,
S04bsu018_u:840: yasyāṃ eva rātrau tvaṃ brāhmaṇānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyase tasyāṃ eva rātrau daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu lokadhātuṣūdāraḥ kīrtiśabdaśloko 'bhyudgacchate,
S04bsu018_u:841: upari ca yāvad brahmalokaparyantaṃ kṛtvā na śakyante tava mūrdhānaṃ vyavalokayituṃ brahmādibhirdevalokairapi /

S04bsu018_u:1311: na kaścit sattvo buddhakṣetraguṇālaṅkārasya varṇaparyantaṃ śaktaḥ syādgṛhītumantaśo divyenāpi cakṣuṣā /
S04bsu018_u:1317: ye cātra sattvā upapadyeyuryāvadbodhiparyantena brahmacāriṇaḥ syuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:1322: sarvasattvāśca tatra navāni vastrāṇi kāśāyāṇi dhārayeyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:1323: sahopapannāśca tatra sattvāḥ suvibhaktivatīṃ samādhiṃ pratilabheyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:1324: yasya samādheḥ pratilābhādgaṇanātikrānteṣu buddhakṣetreṣu gatvā buddhān paryupasīran yāvad bodhiparyantenānupaśyeyuḥ
S04bsu018_u:1325: / ye ca tatra bodhisattvā upapadyeyuḥ te yādṛgjātīyāṃ buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhān ākāṅkṣeyuḥ tādṛgjātīyān buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhāḥ (KpSū 109)
S04bsu018_u:1327_0: sahopapannāśca sattvāḥ samādhiṃ pratilabheyuryasya samādheḥ pratilābhāt daśasu dikṣu
S04bsu018_u:1327_1: gaṇanātikrānteṣu anyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu buddhāstiṣṭhato yāpayato nityaṃ paśyeyurye
S04bsu018_u:1327_2: tatra sattvāḥ pratyājāyeyuḥ te sarva evaṃrūpeṇa cīvaravimānālaṅkārābharaṇavarṇarūpeṇa
S04bsu018_u:1328: na tatra buddhakṣetre pāṃśuśilā kālaparvatā bhaveyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:1331: tatra narakatiryagyoniyamalokaśabdo na syānnākṣaṇaśabdo na duḥkhaśabdaḥ /
S04bsu018_u:1333: tāvadahaṃ bhadanta bhagavan bodhisattvaduṣkaracaryāṃ cariṣye yāvannaivaṃrūpairguṇairbuddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhayiṣye;
S04bsu018_u:1338: apramāṇā ca me prabhā syāt buddhakṣetrakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇām (KpSū 110)
S04bsu018_u:1340: aparimāṇā ca mamāyurbhavedaprameyakalpakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇāṃ na śakyaṃ kenacid gaṇayitumanyatra sārvajñena jñānena /
S04bsu018_u:1342: yanna śakyaṃ gaṇayituṃ anyatra sārvajñena jñānena /
S04bsu018_u:1343: bodhiprāptasya ca mamāprameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣu anyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu buddhā bhagavanto varṇabhāṣaṇaṃ kuryurghoṣaṃ cānuśrāvayeyuryaśa udīrayeyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:1344: bodhiprāptasya ca mamāprameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣvanyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu ye sattvā nāmadheyaṃ śṛṇuyuste sarve buddhakṣetre kuśalamūlapariṇāmanaṃ kṛtvā mama buddhakṣetra upapadyeyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:1346: bodhiprāptasya me 'nyāsu gaṇanātikrāntāsu lokadhātuṣu sattvā bodhicittotpādaṃ kuryuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:1350: te ca māṃ dṛṣṭvā prītiṃ prasādaṃ ca mamāntika utpādayeyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:1354: ye ca tatra bodhisattvāste 'smākaṃ sakāśādaśrutapūrvāṃ dharmadeśanāmākāṅkṣeyuḥ śrotuṃ te yādṛśīmākāṅkṣeyustādṛśīṃ śṛṇuyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:1355: bodhiprāptasya ca mama gaṇanātikrānteṣu buddhakṣetreṣu bodhisattvā nāmadheyaṃ śṛṇuyuḥ te 'vaivartikāḥ syuranuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S04bsu018_u:1357: yādṛśīṃ samādhiṃ dhāraṇīṃ cākāṅkṣeyuḥ tādṛśīṃ samādhiṃ dhāraṇīṃ ca pratilabheyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:1358_0: parinirvṛtasya ca mama gaṇanātikrānteṣu kalpeṣu paścād gaṇanātikrānteṣu buddhakṣetreṣu
S04bsu018_u:1358_1: bodhisattvā mama nāmadheyaṃ śrutvā paramāṃ prītiṃ prasādaṃ prāmodyaṃ ca prāpnuyurmāmeva
S04bsu018_u:1359: bodhisattvabhūtena ca yadā mayā buddhakāryaṃ abhiniṣpāditaṃ tataḥ paścādanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhyeyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:1360: abhisaṃbuddhasya ca mama paramaprasādapratilabdhā bodhisattvāḥ prathamāyāḥ kṣāntyā lābhinaḥ syurdvitīyāyāḥ tṛtīyāyāḥ,
S04bsu018_u:1361: yādṛśīṃ ca samādhiṃ dhāraṇīṃ ākāṅkṣeyustādṛśīṃ pratilabheyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:1363: bodhiprāptasya ca me gaṇanātikrānteṣu buddhakṣetreṣu yāḥ striyo mama nāmadheyaṃ (KpSū 112)
S04bsu018_u:1367: parinirvṛtasya ca me gaṇanātikrānteṣu kalpeṣu gaṇanātikrāntā yāḥ striyo mama nāmadheyaṃ śṛṇuyuḥ tāḥ paramaprītiprāmodyaṃ prasādaṃ ca prāpnuyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:1373: atha khalu kulaputra ratnagarbhastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho rājño 'raṇeminaḥ sādhukāramadāt /
S04bsu018_u:1375: gambhīraste mahārāja praṇidhānaṃ pariśuddhaṃ te buddhakṣetraṃ parigṛhītaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:1376: paśya mahārāja paścimāyāṃ diśi koṭīśatasahasrabuddhakṣetrāṇāṃ atikramya indrasuvirājitā nāma lokadhātuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:1377: tatrendraghoṣeśvararājo nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhastiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati pariśuddhānāṃ sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati /
S04bsu018_u:1383: na ca tatra mātṛgrāmasya nāmāpi jñāyate /
S04bsu018_u:1384_0: sarva ete guṇāstatra buddhakṣetre yathā mahārājenāparimitaṃ buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhapraṇidhānam
S04bsu018_u:1384_1: kṛtamamitāśayāḥ sattvā vaineyāḥ parigṛhītāstena tvaṃ mahārāja indraghoṣeśvararājatathāgatasya
S04bsu018_u:1384_2: parinirvṛtasya tasmin saddharme 'ntarhite ṣaṣṭīnāmantarakalpānāmatyayena sā lokadhāturmeruprabhā nāma bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu018_u:1388: yadācintyamatiguṇarājastathāgataḥ parinirvāsyati tasya ṣoḍaśāntarakalpāḥ saddharmaḥ sthāsyati,
S04bsu018_u:1389: tasya saddharme 'ntarhite sahasrāntarakalpātyayena viratirnāma sā lokadhāturbhaviṣyati /
S04bsu018_u:1393: evaṃ parinirvṛtānāṃ saddharme 'ntarhite aparā nāma sā lokadhāturbhaviṣyati /
S04bsu018_u:1394: tara ratneśvaraghoṣo nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha utpatsyate /
S04bsu018_u:1395: samo buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhaḥ samaṃ cāntarakalpā sthāsyati yāpayiṣyati dharmaṃ ca deśayiṣyati /
S04bsu018_u:1399: evaṃ cāprameyāparimāṇān tathāgatāṃstatra buddhakṣetra upapannān paśyāmi parinirvṛtāṃśca,
S04bsu018_u:1401: tatrānāgate 'dhvani atikrānta ekasmin gaṅgāvālikāsame 'saṃkhyeye pratiṣṭhe dvitīye nadīgaṅgāvālikāsame 'saṃkhyeye sā lokadhātuḥ sukhāvatī nāma bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu018_u:1404: rājāraṇemyāha - “kutra te bhadanta bhagavan bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye 'smākaṃ prathamataraṃ tatra buddhakṣetre (KpSū 115)
S04bsu018_u:1406_0: bhagavān āha - “ime te mahārāja bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye 'prameyairasaṃkhyeyairatulyairaparimāṇairdaśabhyo
S04bsu018_u:1406_1: digbhyaḥ tābhyastābhyo lokadhātubhya āgatā maṃ vandanāya paryupāsanāya dharmaśravaṇāya,
S04bsu018_u:1407: ye mama purato niṣaṇṇā ete 'tītairbuddhairvyākṛtā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S04bsu018_u:1408: pratyutpannairapi buddhairbhagavadbhirete kulaputrā vyākṛtā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S04bsu018_u:1410: ekaikaścaiṣa mahārāja bodhisattvo 'nekeṣāṃ buddhakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇāṃ antike kṛtādhikāro 'varuptakuśalamūlo bhāvitaprajñaḥ,
S04bsu018_u:1411: ta ete mahārāja kulaputrā ye tatra prathamataraṃ buddhakṣetre buddhā bhaviṣyanti” /
S04bsu018_u:1412_0: rājāraṇemyāha - “ayaṃ bhadanta bhagavan samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇo yenāhaṃ sapariṣatko
S04bsu018_u:1412_1: 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpitāḥ sa kiyatā kālenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyate?” /
S04bsu018_u:1415: rājā āha - “yadyeṣa me praṇidhiḥ samṛdhyati yathāhaṃ (KpSū 116)
S04bsu018_u:1417: tadyathāhaṃ bhagavataḥ pādavandanaṃ kuryāṃ pañcamaṇḍalena tadā gaṅgānadīvālikāsamā lokadhātavaḥ prakampantu pracalantu /
S04bsu018_u:1418: ye ca teṣu buddhakṣetreṣu buddhāḥ tiṣṭhanti dhriyanti yāpayanti te ca māṃ vyākuryuḥ” /
S04bsu018_u:1419: atha khalu kulaputra rājāraṇemī ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya pañcamaṇḍalakena pādayornipatitaḥ /
S04bsu018_u:1420: yadaiva rājñaḥ śirasā pṛthivī spṛṣṭā tadā gaṅgānadīvālikāsamā buddhakṣetrāḥ kampitāḥ calitāḥ pracalitāḥ kṣubhitāḥ saṃprakṣubhitāḥ,
S04bsu018_u:1422: “santīraṇe buddhakṣetre dhāraṇe kalpe 'śītivarṣasahasrāyuṣkāyāṃ prajāyāṃ ratnagarbhastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho rājānamaraṇeminaṃ vyākaroti /
S04bsu018_u:1423_1: dvitīye 'saṃkhyeye sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātāvamitaśuddhāyāṃ amitāyurnāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ,
S04bsu018_u:1424: samantato daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsamān lokadhātūn avabhāsayiṣyasi” /
S04bsu018_u:1429: atha khalu kulaputra rājāraṇemī tuṣṭa udagraḥ pramuditāḥ prītisaumanasyajātaḥ,
S04bsu018_u:1431: atha khalu kulaputra samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇo rājño 'raṇemino jyeṣṭhaputramanimiṣaṃ nāma rājakumāramāmantrayati sma /
S04bsu018_u:1434: “avalokitā mayāpāyā ye ca tatra sattvā upapannāḥ pracaṇḍaghoraṃ duḥkhaṃ anubhavanti /
S04bsu018_u:1435: avalokitā mayā svargā ye ca tatra sattvā upapannāḥ saṃkliṣṭacittāḥ punarapyapāyeṣu prapatanti /
S04bsu018_u:1440: sarvaṃ ca kuśalaṃ pariṇāmayāmi anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S04bsu018_u:1441: yad ahaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ careyaṃ ye kecanasattvā duḥkhotpīḍā bhayatarjitā dharmadurbhikṣāndhakāre praviṣṭā līnā dīnā atrāṇā aśaraṇā aparāyaṇā māmanusmareyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:1443: yadyahaṃ divyena śrotreṇa śṛṇuyāṃ divyena cakṣuṣā paśyeyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:1444: na ca tāṃ sattvān vyasanebhyaḥ parimocayeyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:1446: yadāhaṃ bhadanta bhagavan sattvahetościrapraṇidhānaviśeṣeṇa ciraṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ cariṣyāmi tadā me āśāparipūrirbhavatu /
S04bsu018_u:1447: yadāhaṃ bhadanta bhagavan mahārājāraṇemī atikrānte ekasmin gaṅgānadīvālikāsame 'saṃkhyeye pratiṣṭhe dvitīye sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātāvanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyate,
S04bsu018_u:1449: pariśuddhe buddhakṣetre pariśuddhānāṃ sattvānāṃ buddhakāryaṃ kariṣyati,
S04bsu018_u:1450: yāvatyāmitāyustathāgataḥ aparimāṇān kalpān buddhakāryaṃ kṛtvā pariniṣṭhitabuddhakāryo 'nupadhiśeṣanirvāṇadhātau pravekṣyate,
S04bsu018_u:1454: yadāmitāyuṣastathāgatasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya rātryāḥ prathame yāme saddharmo 'ntardhāsyati tasyāmeva rātryāṃ paścime yāme 'hamanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyeyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:1456_0: evamevāhaṃ daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsamāsu lokadhātuṣu ye buddhā bhagavantastiṣṭhanti
S04bsu018_u:1456_1: dhriyanti yāpayanti tān api buddhān bhagavataḥ svareṇa vijñapayāmi vyākurvantu māṃ
S04bsu018_u:1458: evaṃ cāha - “yattvayā kulaputrāvalokitā apāyāḥ avalokitāḥ svargā avalokitaṃ sarvasattvānāṃ duḥkhaṃ saṃjanitaṃ kāruṇyacittaṃ sattvānāṃ duḥkhamocanārthaṃ kleśapraśamanārthaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:1464: yāme saddharmo 'ntardhāsyati tasyāmeva rātryāṃ paścime yāme tvaṃ kulaputrānekavyūhe bodhivṛkṣamūle vajrāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyase,
S04bsu018_u:1468_0: avalokiteśvara āha - “yadi bhagavan nimā mamāśā paripūryate tadyadāhaṃ bhagavataḥ
S04bsu018_u:1468_1: pādābhivandanaṃ karomi tadā ye buddhā bhagavanto daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu
S04bsu018_u:1468_2: lokadhātuṣu tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti te vyākurvantu māṃ,
S04bsu018_u:1469: calatu ca dharaṇī sarvagaṅgānadīvālikāsamāsu daśasu dikṣu lokadhātuṣu,
S04bsu018_u:1472: yadā cāvalokiteśvareṇa bodhisattvena ratnagarbhastathāgataḥ pañcamaṇḍalakena vanditastadā gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu (KpSū 121)
S04bsu018_u:1474: te ca buddhā bhagavanto vyākurvanti peyālaṃ pūrvavat,
S04bsu018_u:1479: prakampitā dharaṇīsakṣetra ṣaḍvikāro bhaviṣyasi jināgrapugalo maharṣī” //
S04bsu018_u:1480: atha khalu samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇo 'grapurohito dvitīyaṃ rājaputraṃ nimirnāmāmantrayāmāsa /
S04bsu018_u:1482: yacca tvayā śubhamupārjitaṃ tatsarvaṃ sattvahetoḥ sarvajñatāyāṃ pariṇāmaya,
S04bsu018_u:1484: atha nimī rājakumāro bhagavataḥ purastānniṣadyedamavocat - “yat mayā bhagavān upasthitaḥ sarvopakaraṇaiḥ sārdhamaparimitena bhikṣusaṅghena,
S04bsu018_u:1487: yacca kāyavāṅmanaḥ sucaritaṃ puṇyaṃ pariṇāmayāmi anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S04bsu018_u:1488: na kevalamasmin kliṣṭe buddhakṣetre bodhimahaṃ spṛśeyaṃ;
S04bsu018_u:1490: tamahaṃ adhyeṣayeyaṃ dharmadeśanāyāṃ yāvaccāsau tathāgato dharmaṃ deśayet tāvadahaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ careyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:1496: sarva eva guṇavyūhaḥ yathā samantaraśmyabhyudgataśrīkūṭarājasya tathāgatasya” /
S04bsu018_u:1498: prāpsyasi tvaṃ kulaputraivaṃrūpaṃ sthānaṃ yathā svayaṃ parigṛhītaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:1499: prāpsyasi tvaṃ kulaputra tasmin buddhakṣetre 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ /
S04bsu018_u:1505: tadyadāhaṃ bhagavataḥ pañcamaṇḍalakena kāyena pādau vandāmi tadā me daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsamā buddhā bhagavanto vyākurvantu,
S04bsu018_u:1507_0: yadā kulaputra mahāsthāmaprāptena satpuruṣeṇa ratnagarbhasya pañcamaṇḍalakena pādābhivandanaṃ
S04bsu018_u:1512: calitā mahāpṛthivī vṛṣṭirvṛṣṭā sumanā varṣairbhaviṣyasi tvaṃ suranarabrahmabhūtaḥ” //
S04bsu018_u:1516: pratigṛhyāñjaliṃ ratnagarbhaṃ tathāgatametadavocat - “yanmayā bhagavān sarvopakaraṇairupasthitaḥ sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṅghena,
S04bsu018_u:1523: daśasu dikṣvanantāparyanteṣu anyeṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhān bhagavataḥ paśyeyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:1524: ye mayā prathamaṃ bodhāya samādāpitā yeṣāṃ mayā tatprathamaṃ bodhicittamutpāditaṃ bodhicitte pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ,
S04bsu018_u:1525: pāramitāsu ca ye mayā samādāpitā niveśitā pratiṣṭhāpitā bodhicaryāṃ caratā,
S04bsu018_u:1526: tān ahaṃ divyena cakṣuṣā gaṅgānadīvālikāsame buddhakṣetre paramāṇurajaḥsameṣu buddhakṣetreṣu buddhān bhagavato dharman deśayataḥ paśyeyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:1529: tāvadahaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ careyaṃ sattvānāmāśayapariśodhayamānaḥ yāvantaḥ kecit sattvā (KpSū 125)
S04bsu018_u:1530: mama buddhakṣetra upapadyeran ta evaṃvidhāḥ syuḥ tadyathā brahmakāyikā devāḥ;
S04bsu018_u:1531: tathā ca buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhaṃ pariśodhayeyaṃ yathā gaṅgānadīvālikāsamaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ ekaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ syāt /
S04bsu018_u:1532: tasya ca buddhakṣetrasya bhavāgraparyantāni prākārāṇi anekaratnasaṃsthitāni nānāratnapratyuptāni ca syuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:1533: sarvā ca tatra buddhakṣetre śuddhavaiḍūryamayī pṛthivī syāt,
S04bsu018_u:1536: sarvasattvāścopapādukāḥ syurna tatra sattvāḥ kavadīkārāhārāḥ syuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:1537: sarve ca tatra sattvā prītyāhārā dharmāhārāḥ syuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:1538: na tatra buddhakṣetre śrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ prajñaptiḥ syāt,
S04bsu018_u:1539: śuddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāmapagatakhilamaladveṣamrakṣāṇāṃ śuddhānāṃ brahmacāriṇāṃ buddhakṣetraṃ pariśuddhaṃ syāt /
S04bsu018_u:1540: sarve tatra bodhisattvā muṇḍāḥ kāṣāyavastradhāriṇaḥ prādurbhaveyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:1542: teṣāṃ dakṣiṇe haste ratnapātrī nānārasapūrṇā prādurbhavet;
S04bsu018_u:1543: samanantaraprādurbhūtānāṃ evaṃrūpāṃ smṛtiṃ pratilabheyurnāsmākaṃ pratirūpaṃ ye vayaṃ kavaḍīkārāhāramāharema, (KpSū 126)
S04bsu018_u:1544: yannūnaṃ vayamanyāsu lokadhātuṣu gatvā buddhān bhagavatastiṣṭhato yāpayato 'nenāhāreṇa pratimānayāmo buddhaśrāvakāṃśca duḥkhitaṃ ca janaṃ pratimānayāmaḥ,
S04bsu018_u:1545: pretabhavaneṣu ca gatvā kṣuttarṣaprajvalitagātrān sattvān anenāhāreṇa pratimānayāmaḥ” /
S04bsu018_u:1546: sahacittotpādena te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā acintyacāritravatīṃ nāma samādhiṃ pratilabheyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:1547: tasya ca samādheḥ pratilābhādasajjanā daśasu dikṣvaprameyeṣvanyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu gaccheyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:1548: tiṣṭhato yāpayato buddhān bhagavata āhāreṇa pratimānayeyuḥ śrāvakāṃścānyāṃśca sattvāṃ,
S04bsu018_u:1549: prītyā pratimānya dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtvā tenaiva pūrvabhaktena svabuddhakṣetraṃ āgaccheyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:1551: yāvat tenaiva pūrvabhaktena svakaṃ buddhakṣetramāgatyānyonyaṃ cīvareṇa prāvarayeyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:1552: yāvanti ca tatra buddhakṣetre teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāmupabhogaḥ paribhogā
S04bsu018_u:1553: bhaveyustaiḥ sarvairbuddhaiḥ śrāvakaiścānyaiśca sattvaiḥ sahasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā paścādātmanā paribhuñjeyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:1560: yāni maṇiratnāni daśasu dikṣvadṛṣṭapūrvāṇi tāni aśrutapūrvāṇi tāni maṇiratnāni pracareyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:1561: yeṣāṃ maṇiratnānāṃ nāmadheye nirdiśyamāne varṣakoṭyo 'pi kṣayaṃ gaccheyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:1562: yaśca bodhisattvaḥ ākāṅkṣeta svarṇamayaṃ eva buddhakṣetraṃ paśyeyaṃ tasya svarṇamayaṃ eva tiṣṭheta /
S04bsu018_u:1566: ya ākāṅkṣeta sphatikamayaṃ vaiḍūryamayaṃ aśmagarbhamayaṃ lohitamuktāmayaṃ musālagalvamayaṃ evaṃvidhaṃ tadbuddhakṣetraṃ paśyema,
S04bsu018_u:1568: agarumayaṃ tagaramayaṃ tamālapatramayaṃ yo bodhisattva ākāṅkṣeduragasāracandanamayaṃ goṣīrṣacandanamayaṃ tadbuddhakṣetraṃ draṣṭuṃ tasya tathaiva syāt /
S04bsu018_u:1569: yathā yathā yādṛśamākāṅkṣeyuḥ tathā tathā tādṛśaṃ syāt;
S04bsu018_u:1577: na ca tatra buddhakṣetre rātridivasānāṃ nāmadheyamapi prajñāyate,
S04bsu018_u:1579_0: na ca tatra buddhakṣetre śītoṣṇaṃ prajñāyate na vyādhirna glānyaṃ na jarāmaraṇamanyatra
S04bsu018_u:1579_1: yo bodhisattva ākāṅkṣedbodhimabhisaṃboddhuṃ so 'nyatra lokadhātāvuṣitvā āyuḥ kṣapayitvā
S04bsu018_u:1583: sarvatra ca buddhakṣetre gaganatale tūryakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrā vādyeyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:1584: na ca tebhyastūryebhyaḥ kāmopasaṃhitāḥ śabdā niścareyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:1588_2: liṅgāni tāni nimittāni tāni sthānāni tāni praṇidhānāni sarva eva mama buddhakṣetre praviśeyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:1590: na ca tatra buddhakṣetre narakatiryakpretāḥ prajñāyeyurna sumerurna cakravāḍamahācakravāḍā na śīlāpāṃśuparvatāḥ prajñāyeyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:1593: syāt, anyatra divyaiḥ kusumairmāndāravamahāmāndāravairna ca tatra durgandhaṃ syānnānāgandhairudārodāraistadbuddhakṣetraṃ sphuṭaṃ syāt /
S04bsu018_u:1597: tāvadahaṃ bhadanta bhagavan bodhisattvacaryāṃ cariṣyāmi yāvannaivaṃvidhaṃ mahāpuruṣakāramabhiniṣpādayiṣyāmi /
S04bsu018_u:1601: na tatra bodhisattvaḥ syād yo na mayā prathamaṃ bodhāya samādāpitaḥ syāt;
S04bsu018_u:1602: sarve te tatra bodhisattvāḥ pratyājāyeyuḥ ye mayā prathamaṃ bodhāya samādāpitāḥ pāramitāsu niveśitāḥ;
S04bsu018_u:1603: tatraivedaṃ buddhakṣetramantargataṃ kuryāṃ sarve cāmī duḥkhā praśamayeyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:1604: bodhisattvabhūto 'haṃ bhadanta bhagavan evaṃrūpaṃ puruṣakāraṃ niṣpādayeyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:1609: tasya ca bodhivṛkṣasya gandhenābhayā ca kṛtsanaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ sphuṭaṃ syāt;
S04bsu018_u:1610: tasya mūle pañcacāturdvīpikapramāṇaṃ me nānāratnavicitraṃ vajrāsanaṃ syāt,
S04bsu018_u:1613: paryaṅkamābhujya tenaiva muhūrtenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyeyaṃ yāvat parinirvāṇakālaṃ tatparyaṅkaṃ na (KpSū 131)
S04bsu018_u:1614: bhindyāṃ na muceyaṃ na tasmād bodhivṛkṣamūlāduttiṣṭheyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:1615: bodhivṛkṣamūlastha evāhaṃ vajrāsane niṣaṇṇo 'haṃ nirmitān buddhān bodhisattvāṃśca gaṇanātikrānteṣvanyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu preṣayeyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:1616: ekaiko buddha ekapūrvabhaktena sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayet,
S04bsu018_u:1617: tenaiva pūrvabhaktena gaṇanātikrāntān sattvān anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpayeyuḥ pratiṣṭhāpayeyuḥ avaivartikāṃ sthāpayeyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:1619: bodhiprāptasya me gaṇanātikrānteṣu daśasu dikṣvanyāsu lokadhātuṣu mama kāyo dṛṣyet,
S04bsu018_u:1620: yeṣāṃ ca sattvānāṃ mama kāyo lakṣaṇālaṅkṛtaścakṣurindriyasyābhāsamāgacchet sarve te sattvā niyatā bhaveyuranuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S04bsu018_u:1621: yāvad bodhiparinirvāṇena te sattvā avirahitā bhaveyurbuddhairbhagavadbhiḥ /
S04bsu018_u:1622: na tatrendriyavikalā bhaveyurye ca tatra bodhisattvā māṃ draṣṭuṃ iccheyuste yena yenaiva gaccheyuḥ parivarteyuḥ caṃkrameyurniṣīdeyuḥ tiṣṭheyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:1623: sarve te bodhisattvāḥ samanantarotpāditena buddhanamaskāracittena māṃ bodhivṛkṣaniṣaṇṇaṃ paśyeyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:1624: dṛṣṭvā ca yasya dharmasaṃśayaḥ syāt so 'sya sahadarśanena vigacchettīrṇavacikitsāḥ syādanupadiṣṭasya dharmapadasyārthamājāneyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:1626: āyurbhavet na śakyate kenacid gaṇayituṃ anyatra sārvajñena jñānena,
S04bsu018_u:1628: yasmiṃśca kṣaṇe 'haṃ tatra buddhakṣetre 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyeyaṃ tasmin kṣaṇe tatra buddhakṣetre bodhisattvā muṇḍāḥ kāṣāyavastrāḥ saṃbhaveyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:1629: yāvan mama parinirvāṇānna cātra buddhakṣetra ekasattvo 'pi dīrghakeśaḥ syāt śuklaprāvaraṇo vā,
S04bsu018_u:1632: tvamapi paṇḍito vyakto medhāvī atīvaśobhanaṃ te praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:1634: yatastvaṃ kulaputra sarvasattvānāmarthāyaivaṃrūpāṃ pravarāṃ praśastāṃ matiṃ kṛtavān pravaro buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhaḥ parigṛhītaḥ,
S04bsu018_u:1636_1: praviṣṭe ca tṛtīye 'saṃkhyeye dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi śuddhavirajaḥsannicayo nāma lokadhāturbhaviṣyati,
S04bsu018_u:1640: samantadarśī nāma tathāgato bhaviṣyasi arhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ /
S04bsu018_u:1641: evaṃrūpā ca te bodhisattvaparṣadbhaviṣyati sarve caite praṇidhānāstvayi saṃpatsyante yathā tvayā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ;
S04bsu018_u:1644: ye ca te mañjuśrīssattvā nāmaṃ śroṣyanti teṣāṃ sarvakarmāvaraṇakṣayo bhaviṣyati,
S04bsu018_u:1646_0: mañjuśrīrāha - “yadi me bhagavannevaṃrūpā āśāparipūrirbhavediti yathā me praṇidhānaṃ
S04bsu018_u:1646_1: kṛtaṃ tathā caiva māṃ buddhā bhagavanto vyākurvantu ye daśasu dikṣvaprameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣu
S04bsu018_u:1646_2: lokadhātuṣu tiṣṭhanti dhriyanti yāpayanti sattvānāṃ ca dharmaṃ deśayanti /
S04bsu018_u:1651: tebhyaśca māndāravebhya evaṃrūpaḥ śabdo niścaratu yaduta buddhaśabdo dharmaśabdaḥ saṅghaśabdaḥ (KpSū 134)
S04bsu018_u:1653: yadā cāhaṃ bhagavataḥ pañcamaṇḍalena pādau vandeya tadā caivaṃrūpaṃ nimittaṃ prādurbhavet” /
S04bsu018_u:1654: yadā ca mañjuśriyā kumārabhūtena bhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtaṃ tadā tatkṣaṇādevamaprameyāsaṃkhyeyā buddhakṣetrāḥ prakaṃpitā,
S04bsu018_u:1656: sarvasattvāścaivaṃrūpeṇa sukhena samarpitā abhavanyathā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:1657: ye ca bodhisattvā mahāsattvāsteṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ dharmaṃ śṛṇvanti te tān buddhān bhagavataḥ paripṛcchanti,
S04bsu018_u:1658: “ko 'tra hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayaḥ evaṃrūpāṇāṃ nimittānāṃ prādurbhāvāya?
S04bsu018_u:1659: ” te ca buddhā bhagavanto mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtaṃ vyākurvanti anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S04bsu018_u:1662: calitā kṣitiḥ tarpitāḥ sattvāḥ saukhyaiḥ puṣpāḥ pravṛṣṭā bheṣyase buddha loka” // iti //
S04bsu018_u:1664: atha khalu kulaputra samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇaścaturthaṃ rājaputramānaṅgaṇaṃ nāmāmantrayati /
S04bsu018_u:1671: tena tvaṃ kulaputra vajracchedaprajñāvabhāsaśrīrnāma bodhisattvo bhavasva /
S04bsu018_u:1674: samantabhadro nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasampanno bhaviṣyasi yāvad buddho bhagavān /
S04bsu018_u:1675: evaṃrūpaṃ ca te buddhakṣetramanekaguṇavyūhitaṃ bhaviṣyati yathā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ” /
S04bsu018_u:1677: samanantaravyākṛtaśca kulaputra ratnagarbheṇa tathāgatena vajracchedaprajñāvabhāso bodhisattvo 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S04bsu018_u:1679_0: sa āha - “yadi me bhadanta bhagavannevaṃrūpāśā paripūryeta tadyadāhaṃ bhagavantaṃ
S04bsu018_u:1680: ye ca tatra lokadhātuṣu sattvā upapannā bhaveyuḥ nairayikā vā tairyagyonikā vā yāmalaukikā vā devā vā manuṣyā vā te sarve taṃ gandhaṃ ghrāyeyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:1681: teṣāṃ kāyavyādhiḥ kāyaduḥkhaṃ cittavyādhiḥ cittaduḥkhaṃ ca tāvacciraṃ praśāntaṃ bhavedyāvadahaṃ śīrṣeṇa pṛthivīṃ spṛśeyaṃ” /
S04bsu018_u:1682: atha khalu kulaputra vajracchedaprajñāvabhāso bodhisattvo ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya pañcamaṇḍalena pādau vandate /
S04bsu018_u:1683: atha tavadeva gaṅgānadīvālikāsamā lokadhātavo divyātikrāntenodāreṇa gandhena sphuṭā babhūvuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:1684: sarveṣāṃ ca sattvānāṃ kāyavyādhiścittavyādhiḥ kāyaduḥkhaṃ cittaduḥkhaṃ ca praśāntaṃ pratiprasrabdhaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:1689: atha khalu kulaputra samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇaḥ pañcamaṃ rājaputramabhayaṃ nāmāmantrayate sma /
S04bsu018_u:1691: tatrāhaṃ bhadanta bhagavan bodhimabhisaṃbudhyeyaṃ yatra na narakā bhaveyurna tiryagyonirna yamalokāḥ,
S04bsu018_u:1692: yatra nīlavaiḍūryamayī bhūmirvistareṇa yathā padmāyāṃ lokadhātau buddhakṣetre guṇavyūhā tathā vaktavyāḥ /
S04bsu018_u:1693: abhayaśca rājaputro ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasyāgrataḥ padmaṃ sthāpayitvāha /
S04bsu018_u:1694: “yadi me bhadanta bhagavannevaṃrūpā āśā paripūryeta tadahaṃ bhagavato 'nubhāvena darśanavyūhaṃ samādhiṃ pratilabheyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:1695: yenāhaṃ bhagavato 'grato daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsamāsu lokadhātuṣu buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsaṃkhyai rathacakrapramāṇamātraiḥ (KpSū 138)
S04bsu018_u:1696: padmaiḥ puṣpavṛṣṭiḥ pravarṣet vayaṃ ca paśyema” /
S04bsu018_u:1697: sahodīrate vākye buddhānubhāvena darśanavyūhaṃ samādhiṃ pratilabdhavān,
S04bsu018_u:1698: daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamai rathacakrapramāṇāmātraiḥ padmaiḥ padmavarṣaṃ pravarṣitaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:1700: bhagavān āha - “atīva kulaputra śobhanaṃ tvayā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:1704: sa āha - “yadi mamānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhāvāśāparipūrirbhaveta tadete padmā gagane tiṣṭhantu tathaiva gagane sthitā varṣantu” /
S04bsu018_u:1706: tena hi tvaṃ kulaputra gaganamudro nāma bhavasva /
S04bsu018_u:1709: padmottaraśca nāma tathāgato bhaviṣyasyarhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpanno yāvadbuddho bhagavān aprameyena śuddhena bodhisattvasaṅghena,
S04bsu018_u:1712: gaganamudro bodhisattvo ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya pādau śirasā nipapāta /
S04bsu018_u:1716: atha khalu kulaputra samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇaḥ ṣaṣṭhaṃ rājaputramambaraṃ nāmāntrayati sma /
S04bsu018_u:1718: yāvad yathā gaganamudreṇa bodhisattvena praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:1719: “yadi me bhagavannevaṃrūpā āśā paripūryeta tad daśadiśī gaṅgānadīvālikāsamāsu (KpSū 140)
S04bsu018_u:1720: lokadhātuṣu sarvagaganeṣu saptaratnamayāḥ chatrāḥ prādurbhavantu hemajālapraticchannāḥ saptaratnamayābhirghaṇṭābhiralaṅkṛtāḥ /
S04bsu018_u:1721: tatra chatraghaṇṭājālairevaṃrūpaḥ śabdo niścaret yaduta buddhaśabdo dharmaśabdaḥ saṅghaśabdaḥ pāramitāśabdo balaśabdo 'bhijñāśabdo vaiśāradyaśabdaḥ,
S04bsu018_u:1722: sarve ca te sattvā evaṃrūpaṃ śabdaṃ śṛṇuyuḥ te śrutvā sarve 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādayeyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:1723: ye cātra sattvāḥ pūrvamutpāditabodhicittāste 'vaivartikā bhaveyuranuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau” /
S04bsu018_u:1724: samanantaravyāhṛte 'smiṃ vyāhāre atha daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsameṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvagaganatalāt peyālaṃ evaṃrūpāḥ śabdā niścaranti /
S04bsu018_u:1726: punarevaṃ āha - “sacenme bhadanta bhagavannevaṃrūpā āśā paripūryeta yathā me praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ tadahaṃ bhagavataḥ purato jñānavairocanaṃ samādhiṃ pratilabheya,
S04bsu018_u:1728: pratilabdhe ca samādhau māṃ bhagavāṃ vyākuryāt” /
S04bsu018_u:1736_2: ādityasomā nāma lokadhātuḥ tatra tvaṃ bodhimabhisaṃbhotsyase,
S04bsu018_u:1737: dharmavaśavartīśvararājo nāma tathāgato bhaviṣyasyarhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpanno yāvad buddho bhagavān” /
S04bsu018_u:1738: sa ca vegavairocano bodhisattvastaṃ bhagavantaṃ pañcamaṇḍalena vandati ratnagarbhaṃ tathāgataṃ /
S04bsu018_u:1740: “uttiṣṭha suvrata surata dāntacitta sattvebhyaḥ tīvrakaruṇā mahatī pravṛttā /
S04bsu018_u:1741: tāre hi sattvān duḥkhārṇavatīraṃ saṃsthā yāvanna budhyasi anuttarabuddhabodhiṃ” //
S04bsu018_u:1743: atha khalu kulaputra samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇaḥ saptamaṃ rājaputramaṅgajamāmantrayāṃ āsa /
S04bsu018_u:1744: peyālaṃ, “na cāsmiṃ kliṣṭe buddhakṣetre tatrāhaṃ bodhimabhisaṃbuddheyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:1745: yatra ca na narakā na tiryagyoniḥ na yamalokaḥ prajñāyate,
S04bsu018_u:1746: na mātṛgrāmo na ca sattvānāṃ garbhavāsaḥ,
S04bsu018_u:1747: na sumeruḥ na cakravāḍamahācakravāḍā na pāṃśuśailaparvatā notsadaśarkarakaṭhallakaṇṭakagahanā na kāṣṭhavṛkṣā na mahāsamudrā,
S04bsu018_u:1748: na ca tatrādityacandrā na tārakarūpā na rātridivasā na tamaskandhā,
S04bsu018_u:1749: na ca tatra sattvānāmuccāraprasrāvakheṭasiṅghāṇakaṃ na kāyakhedadurgandhaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:1750: na ca sattvānāṃ kāyaklamatā bhavet na cittaklamatā;
S04bsu018_u:1752: sarvā ca tatra bhūmiraśmagarbhamayī bhavet anekaratnaśatasahasrālaṅkṛtā bhavet,
S04bsu018_u:1753: māndāravamahāmāndāravapuṣpāvakīrṇaṃ ca tad buddhakṣetraṃ nānāratnavṛkṣālaṅkṛtaṃ bhavet;
S04bsu018_u:1755: nānāratnaduṣyā nānāratnavastrā nānāratnamālā nānāratnābharaṇālaṅkārālaṅkṛtā nānāmālyebhyo nānāvādyairnānāratnabhājanairnānāpuṣpaiśca te ratnavṛkṣālaṅkṛtā (KpSū 143)
S04bsu018_u:1759: samāpannāśca tatra bodhisattvā darśanavyūhaṃ nāma samādhiṃ pratilabheyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:1760: yena samādhinā pratilabdhena daśasu dikṣu buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamān anyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tiṣṭhato yāpayato buddhān bhagavataḥ paśyeyuḥ;

S04bsu018_u:2104: / yadi ca me bhadanta bhagavannime praṇidhānā yāvadbodhiparyantamupādāya saṃṛdhyeyuḥ yathā bhagavataḥ purataḥ praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:2105: tadubhābhyāṃ pāṇibhyāṃ divyāścakraratnāḥ prādurbhavantu sahasrārāḥ sanābhikāḥ sanemikāḥ ādityavarṇaprabhāsvarāḥ” /
S04bsu018_u:2106: sahabhāṣitāyāṃ asyāṃ vāci amighena rājaputreṇobhāyāṃ pāṇibhyāṃ tathārūpāṇi cakrāṇi (KpSū 164)
S04bsu018_u:2108: punarāha - “yadi me bhadanta bhagavannevaṃrūpā āśā paripūryeta yāvadbodhiparyantena tadime cakrāḥ śūnyeṣu pañcakaṣāyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu gacchantu,
S04bsu018_u:2109_0: evaṃrūpeṇoccaśabdena yathā nandopanandā nāgarājā gacchanti tathā sarvāvantaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ
S04bsu018_u:2110: ye ca tatra sattvā upapannāsteṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ śrotrendriyeṣvayaṃ dharmaparyāyamābhāsamāgacchatu,
S04bsu018_u:2111: nipatitamātre ca teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ rāgaḥ praśamatu,
S04bsu018_u:2114: preṣitau ca kulaputrāmighena rājaputreṇa tau dvau cakraratnau tau caivaṃrūpeṇa javena gacchatastadyathā buddhā bhagavanto buddhajavena gacchanti;
S04bsu018_u:2115_0: evameva tau dvau cakraratnau gacchataḥ daśasu diśāsvaprameyeśvasaṃkhyeyeṣu pañcakaṣāyeṣu
S04bsu018_u:2118: teṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ rāgo yāvan mātsaryacittacaitasikāḥ praśāntāḥ,
S04bsu018_u:2119: sarve ca buddhajñānaviṣayaṃ manaskāreṇānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittānyutpāditavanto,
S04bsu018_u:2120: muhūrtamātreṇa ca te cakrāḥ pratinivṛtyāmighasya rājaputrasya purataḥ sthitāḥ /
S04bsu018_u:2121: atha khalu kulaputra ratnagarbhastathāgataḥ amighasya rājaputrasya sādhukāramadāt,
S04bsu018_u:2124: ime ca divyāścakraratnāḥ śūnyeṣu pañcakaṣāyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu preṣitā,
S04bsu018_u:2130: akṣobhya āha - “tādṛśamahaṃ bhadanta bhagavan buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhamākāṅkṣāmi yathā sarvalokasvarṇabhūrbhavet,
S04bsu018_u:2131: samāpāṇitalopamā divyamaṇiratnavyavakīrṇā apagataśarkarakaṭhallā apagataśilāstaṃbhapāṣāṇaparvatā mṛdukā kācalindikasukhasaṃsparṣā,
S04bsu018_u:2135: na ca tatra buddhakṣetre durgandhā bhāvā bhaveyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:2138: na ca tatra sattvānāṃ jarāvyādhimaraṇaṃ bhavet,
S04bsu018_u:2139: na ca parasparabhayaṃ na ca parasparaviheṭhā na ca sattvānāmakālamaraṇaṃ vipratisāramaraṇaṃ nāsamāhitamaraṇaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:2142: na pañcakaṣāyeṣu śūnyesu buddhakṣetreṣūpapadyeyuryāvadbodhiparinirvāṇāt buddhadarśanāvirahitā bhaveyurdharmaśravaṇena saṅghopasthānenāvirahitā /
S04bsu018_u:2144: sarve ca tatra daśakuśalāṃ karmapathān samādāya varteyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:2145: na ca tatra buddhakṣetre sattvānāṃ śīlpagrahaṇaṃ bhavet,
S04bsu018_u:2147: na ca tatra sattvānāṃ mārāvatāraṃ mārgena /
S04bsu018_u:2148: na ca tatra sattvā durvarṇā bhaveyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:2149: na ca tatra sattvā vaimātra bhaveyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:2152: na ca tatra śrāvakānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ vā śuklamokṣaṇaṃ bhavet,
S04bsu018_u:2154: sarve ca tatra sattvā dharmakāmā dharmaparyeṣṭiparā bhaveyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:2155: na ca tatra buddhakṣetra ekasattvo 'pi viparītadṛṣṭiko bhavet na cānyatīrthiko,
S04bsu018_u:2156: na ca tatra sattvānāṃ kāyaklamatā bhavet cittaklamatā vā bhavet;
S04bsu018_u:2157: sarve ca te tatra sattvāḥ pañcābhijñā bhaveyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:2158: na ca tatra sattvānāṃ tṛṣṇā vā bhukṣā vā viheṭhayet,
S04bsu018_u:2159: yādṛśaṃ cāhāramākāṅkṣeyuḥ tādṛśaṃ ratnabhājaneṣu purataḥ prādurbhavet yathā kāmāvacarāṇāṃ devānāṃ /
S04bsu018_u:2160: na coccāraprasrāvakheṭasiṅghāṇamaśru vā kāye svedo vā bhavet,
S04bsu018_u:2161: na ca tatra śītaṃ noṣṇaṃ bhavet,
S04bsu018_u:2164: te ca tatra devamanuṣyāṇāṃ gandhakṛtyaṃ kurvīranyadākāṅkṣeyuḥ yādṛśamākāṅkṣeyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:2175: tatra ca sattvānāṃ saptaratnamayāḥ kūṭāgārā bhaveyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:2176: teṣu ca kūṭāgāreṣu saptaratnamayāḥ paryaṅkāḥ stritāḥ (KpSū 168)
S04bsu018_u:2182: yathārūpā ca tatra sattvā vastrābharaṇaṃ ākāṅkṣeyuḥ te tān tebhyaḥ kalpavṛkṣebhyo gṛhītvā prāvareyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:2186: vāyusamīritaśca tato bodhivṛkṣāddivyātikrāntaḥ snigdho manojñaḥ pāramitā abhijñendriyabalabodhyaṅgaśabdo niścaret,
S04bsu018_u:2187: ye ca sattvāstaṃ śabdaṃ śṛṇuyuste virāgacittāḥ smṛtiṃ pratilabheyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:2188: sarvaguṇopetaśca tatra buddhakṣetre mātṛgrāmo bhavet tadyathā tuṣitadevanikāye 'psarāḥ /
S04bsu018_u:2189: na ca tatra mātṛgrāmo durgandho bhavet,
S04bsu018_u:2194: gatvā mātṛgrāmaṃ sarāgena cittena prekṣate muhūrtena puruṣasya rāgaḥ praśāmyeta,
S04bsu018_u:2199: yā ca tatra strī puruṣaṃ sarāgaṃ nirīkṣeta gurviṇī bhavet,
S04bsu018_u:2201: ye garbhavāsairdārakadārikā evaṃ kāyacaitasikaṃ sukhaṃ pratisaṃvedayeyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:2202: tadyathā devāstrayastriṃśā nandanti pramodanti kāyacaitasikaṃ sukhaṃ pratisaṃvedayanti /
S04bsu018_u:2203: evaṃrūpaśca tatra buddhakṣetre garbhavāsā dārakadārikāḥ saptarātriṃdivasāni sukhaṃ saṃvedayeyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:2204: tāśca striyo garbhiṇyaḥ evaṃrūpaṃ sukhaṃ pratisaṃvedayeyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:2206: na ca te sattvā aśucinā garbhamalena kliśyeyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:2207: saptame ca divase paramasugandhena parameṇa ca sukhopadhānena samarpitāḥ pratyājāyeyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:2208: na caiva sā strī duḥkhāṃ pratyanubhaved,
S04bsu018_u:2209: ubhau ca puṣkariṇīmavataritvā snātvā ca sā strī evaṃrūpāṃ smṛtiṃ pratilabheta,
S04bsu018_u:2214: yacca pūrvajanmani tathārūpaṃ karmakṛtamupacitaṃ bhavedyena ca bahukalpakoṭīstrībhāvamanubhavitavyaṃ tena samādhinābhinirvṛtena strībhāvaṃ ca sarveṇa sarvaṃ parikṣayaṃ gacched,
S04bsu018_u:2215: yāvat parinirvāṇaṃ na bhūyaḥ strībhāvaṃ pratilabhet /
S04bsu018_u:2216: yeṣāṃ ca sattvānāṃ tathārūpaṃ karmakṛtamupacitaṃ bhavet yad gaṇanātikrāntān kalpān nityagarbhavāsena pratyājāyeyurduḥkhaṃ pratyanubhavitavyaṃ bhavet,
S04bsu018_u:2217_0: te bodhiprāptasya me nāmadheyaṃ śṛṇuyuḥ prasādaṃ ca pratilabheyuste tataścyavitvā
S04bsu018_u:2217_1: mama buddhakṣetra upapadyeyurgarbhavāsena ca pratyājāyeyustatra sarveṇa sarvaṃ tatkarmaparikṣayaṃ

S04bsu018_u:2219: karmaparikṣayena mama buddhakṣetre mātṛgrāmo vā garbhavāso vā prajñāyeta ekāntasukhasamarpitāste sattvāstatra buddhakṣetre bhaveyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:2223: manuṣyā ulkāvatīṃ nāma samādhiṃ pratilabheyustena ca samādhinā te sattvāḥ śūnyatāvabhāsāṃ gambhīrān dharmān avabudhyeyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:2224: na ca tatra buddhakṣetre kāmopasaṃhitaḥ śabdo bhavet /
S04bsu018_u:2225: bodhivṛkṣamūlaniṣaṇṇaścāhaṃ bhadanta bhagavan muhūrtenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ prāpnūyāṃ /
S04bsu018_u:2226: bodhiprāptasya ca me tatra buddhakṣetre na bhūyaścandrasūryāṇāṃ prabhā prajñāyeta,
S04bsu018_u:2228: evaṃrūpāṃ cāhaṃ prabhāṃ pramuñceyaṃ yena divyena cakṣuṣāprameyāsaṃkhyeyairanyairbuddhakṣetraistiṣṭhato buddhān bhagavataḥ paśyeyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:2229: bodhiprāptaścāhamevaṃrūpeṇa svareṇa dharmaṃ deśayeyaṃ yena svareṇa trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ buddhakṣetramāpūrayeyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:2230: ye ca tatra sattvāḥ syuḥ te sarve buddhānusmṛtiṃ pratilabheyuste yena yena gaccheyuḥ caṃkrameyurniṣīdeyurvā parivarteyurvā,
S04bsu018_u:2231: te satatasamitaṃ māṃ paśyeyuryathārūpeṣu dharmeṣu dharmasaṃśayā bhaveyuḥ teṣāṃ mama darśanamātreṇa vyavalokanamātreṇa ca teṣāṃ saṃśayā vigaccheyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:2232: bodhiprāptasya ca me ye sattvā daśasu dikṣvaprameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu śrāvakayānikā vā pratyekabuddhayānikā vānuttarayānikā vā mama nāmaṃ vā varṇaṃ va śṛṇuyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:2235: te tatra mama dharmaṃ śrutvā ye śrāvakayānikāste 'ṣṭavimokṣadhyāyino 'rhanto bhaveyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:2236: ye ca pratyekabuddhayānikāḥ te pratyekāṃ bodhimabhigaccheyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:2237: ye ca tatra bodhisattvā mahāyānikāste mat sakāśāddharmaṃ śrutvā gambhīrāṃ samādhikṣāntidhāraṇīṃ ca pratilabheyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:2239: aprameyaśca me śrāvakasaṅgho bhaved yo na śakyaṃ kenacidgaṇayituṃ anyatra svayaṃ tathāgatena /
S04bsu018_u:2240: bodhiprāptaścāhaṃ yena yena gaccheyaṃ yatra yatra ca pādatalena pṛthivīṃ spṛśeyaṃ tatra tatra sahasrapatrāṇi padmāni suvarṇāvabhāsāni prādurbhaveyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:2241: te ca padmāḥ śūnyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu gatvā mama varṇaśabdaṃ ghoṣaṃ niścārayeyuḥ;
S04bsu018_u:2242: te ca sattvā mama nāma varṇaṃ yaśaśca śrutvā prītiprasādaprāmodyamutpādayeyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:2249: anityaduḥkhānātmaśūnyatābhiratā ārabdhavīryā ca sā parṣadbhaveddharmaśravaṇā saṅghaprāgbhārā /
S04bsu018_u:2250: ye ca tatrāvaivartikā bodhisattvā bhaveyuste 'nāgatapraviṣṭāḥ smṛtiṃ pratilabheyuste jātivyativṛttā prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāṃ kathāṃ kathayeyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:2251: yāvadbodhiparyantena te dharmā na saṃpramoṣaṃ gaccheyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:2256: bhaviṣyasi tvamakṣobhyānāgate 'dhvani atikrānte hyekasmin gaṅgānadīvālikāsame 'saṃkhyeya 'nupraviṣṭe dvitīye purastimāyāṃ diśi,
S04bsu018_u:2258: evaṃrūpayā guṇavyūhayā saṃpannā yathā tvayā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:2260: evamevākṣobhyo nāma bhaviṣyasi tathāgato yāvadbuddho bhagavān” /
S04bsu018_u:2261: akṣobhya āha - “yadi me bhadanta bhagavannevaṃrūpāśā paripūryeta tatsarvatra lokadhātuṣu sattvāḥ skandhadhātvāyatanaparigṛhītā (KpSū 174)
S04bsu018_u:2262_0: ye ca sattvāḥ sattvasaṃgraheṇa saṃgṛhītāste sarve maitracittā bhavantvavairacittā
S04bsu018_u:2262_1: akaluṣacittāste evaṃrūpaṃ kāyasukhaṃ saṃvedayeyuḥ tadyathāpi nāma daśabhūmisthitasya

S04bsu018_u:2264: yadāhaṃ bhagavataḥ pañcamaṇḍalena pādau vandeta tadā sarvapṛthivī svarṇāvabhāsā bhavatu” /
S04bsu018_u:2265: sa ca kulaputra ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya pañcamaṇḍalena pādau vandati tadā ca tasmin samaye sarvasattvā evaṃrūpeṇa sukhena samarpitā yathā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ,

S04bsu018_u:2271: atha khalu kulaputra samudrareṇurbrāhmaṇo daśamaṃ rājaputraṃ himaṇiṃ nāmāmantrayate sma /

S04bsu018_u:2273: “yadi me bhadanta bhagavan nevaṃrūpāśā paripūryeta tatsarvasattvā buddhālaṃbanamanaskāraṃ pratilabhantu /

S04bsu018_u:2284: yadā khalu kulaputra gandhahastirbodhisattvo ratnagarbhasya tathāgatasya pañcamaṇḍalena pādau vandati tadā sarvasminnārāme campakapuṣpavarṣamabhiprāvarṣat /

S04bsu018_u:2297: ratnaketurāha - “yadi me bhadanta bhagavannevaṃrūpāśā paripūryeta tadyadāhaṃ bhagavataḥ pādau vande tadā sarvasattvā evaṃrūpāṃ smṛtiṃ pratilabheyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:2298: yathā bodhisattvā ye mahābodhiṃ saṃprasthitāḥ sarvasattvānāmarthāya karuṇāyamānāḥ saṃbodhau prasthitā na nivarteyuḥ” /

S04bsu018_u:2307: kṛtvaivaṃrūpā buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhāḥ parigṛhītā yathā gaganamudreṇa bodhisattvena praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ,

S04bsu018_u:2857_3: nirmuktāḥ sarvakuśalakriyāyāṃ sarve śūnyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣūjjhitāḥ sakuśalamūlasamavadhānagatāḥ
S04bsu018_u:2858: kāle sahe buddhakṣetre daśavarṣāyuṣkā bhadrakalpe manuṣyā bhaviṣyanti,
S04bsu018_u:2860: tatkālaṃ bhavāvartake saṃsāracakre 'trāṇā aśaraṇā aparāyaṇā duḥkhabhājanabhūtāḥ sattvāstāṃ parivarjayitvā svakasvakā buddhakṣetrāḥ pradhānapradhānāḥ parigṛhītāḥ,
S04bsu018_u:2861: suvinītāśca pariśuddhāśayāḥ avaruptakuśalamūlāḥ ārabdhavīryā bahubuddhakṛtādhikārā vaineyāḥ parigṛhītāḥ /
S04bsu018_u:2865: yathābhiprāyāḥ sattvāḥ praṇidhānaṃ kurvanti buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhāśca parigṛhītāstatraiva ca mayā vyākṛtāḥ” /
S04bsu018_u:2866: brāhmaṇaḥ prāha - “mamāpi bhadanta bhagavan hṛdayaṃ kaṃpati tadyathāpi kiṃśukapatraṃ paramadīnamānaso 'haṃ sarvaśarīraṃ ca me āyāsitaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:2867: yadi me bhadanta bhagavan sattvāḥ karuṇāspadabhūtā bodhisattvaistatkālamutsṛṣṭā mahākaliyugāndhakāraprakṣiptāḥ sarvaparivarjitāḥ /
S04bsu018_u:2869_1: 'vaśiṣṭe dvitīye gaṅgānadīvālikāsame 'saṃkhyeye tasmiṃśca bhadrake mahākalpe daśavarṣaśatāyuṣkāyāṃ
S04bsu018_u:2869_2: prajāyāṃ kālaṃ pratīkṣamāṇāstāvacciramahaṃ saṃsāre na parikhidyeyaṃ bodhicārikāṃ caramāṇa,
S04bsu018_u:2872: śrutaṃ ca mayā bhagavataḥ sakāśād “vastunimittaṃ parityāgeyaṃ dānapāramitā” /
S04bsu018_u:2873: tathārūpamahaṃ dānapāramitāṃ cariṣyāmi yathā janmāntareṣvaprameyāḥ sattvā yācanakā āgamiṣyanti teṣāṃ tathārūpāṃ parityāgaṃ parityajeyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:2876_0: ye ca punaḥ sattvā atityāgayācanakā āgatvā yācayeran tadyathā dāsadāsīgrāmanagararājyabhāryāputraduhitṛhastaparityāgapādaparityāgakarṇanāsānayanajihvācarmarudhirāsthikāyajīvitaśiraḥparityāgaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:2877: evaṃrūpāḥ parityāgāḥ paramaprasannaḥ kāruṇyamānasaḥ aphalābhikāṅkṣī sattvānāṃ dānaṃ dadyāṃ vaineyānukaṃpārthaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:2879_0: yanna kadācit pūrvaṃ kenacit sattvena evaṃrūpāḥ parityāgāḥ parityaktāḥ syurna ca
S04bsu018_u:2879_1: punaḥ paścāt kaścid bodhisattvaḥ anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cārikāṃ caramāṇaḥ evaṃrūpāḥ
S04bsu018_u:2880: yadahaṃ teṣu janmāntareṣu aprameyāsaṃkhyeyeṣu kalpakoṭīnayutaśatasahasreṣvanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cārikāṃ caramāṇaḥ dānapāramitāyāṃ careyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:2881: yadahaṃ mahākaruṇāsamanvāgatānāṃ paścimakānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ parityāganetrīguṇān sthāpayeyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:2889: “yā vivekatā sarvasaṃskṛtā bhāvanā udyujyanā sarvāsaṃskṛtaśāntamanuttaracaryayā avivartanā iyaṃ vīryapāramitā” /
S04bsu018_u:2890: “yā sarvasaṃskāreṣu viparyāsaprahāṇāya śūnyatā samudācāraḥ iyaṃ dhyānapāramitā” /
S04bsu018_u:2894: na kaścid bodhisattvo 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cārikāṃ caramāṇaḥ evaṃ dṛḍhotsāhabalavegena
S04bsu018_u:2897: bodhisattvo 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cārikāṃ caramāṇaḥ evaṃ dṛḍhotsāhabalavegena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caret,
S04bsu018_u:2902: śīlāniśrayatā kṣāntyāmanyanatā vīrye 'nāyūhanatā dhyāneṣvapratiṣṭhitatā prajñāyāmadvayatāṃ careyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:2904: ekaikasya sattvasyārthe cāhaṃ kuśalamūlabījasaṃtatyāḥ pratiṣṭhāpanārthaṃ daśamahākalpān (KpSū 230)
S04bsu018_u:2906: evaṃ tiryakpreteṣu yakṣadaridreṣu manuṣyadaridreṣu duḥkhāṃ vedanāmutsaheyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:2907: yathā caikasattvasya santatyāṃ kuśalamūlabījaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayeyaṃ tathā sarvasattvānāṃ evaṃrūpāṃ riktamuṣṭisadṛśasantānāṃ vaineyāṃ pratigṛhṇīyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:2910: tāvacciramahaṃ saṃsāre buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamān buddhān bhagavataḥ paryupāsitvā ekaikasya ca buddhasyāhaṃ buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamāṃ vividhāṃ
S04bsu018_u:2912: ekaikasya ca buddhasya sakāśādbuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamān guṇān adhigaccheyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:2914: evaṃ pratyekabuddhayānikānāmevaṃ śrāvakayānikānāṃ yathābhiprāyāṃśca sattvān tathāhaṃ samādāpayeyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:2915: asati buddhotpāde loka ṛṣivratenāhaṃ sattvāṃ daśakuśalakarmapatheṣu niyojayeyaṃ samādhāvabhijñāsu ca niyojayeyaṃ, (KpSū 231)
S04bsu018_u:2917: nārāyaṇabhaktāṃścandrasūryabhaktāṃ yāvadbrahmabhaktān brahmarūpeṇāhaṃ sattvān kuśaladharmeṣu niyojayeyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:2921: vyasanagatāṃśca sattvāṃ svakena kāyena jīvitena ca paritrāyeyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:2922: tāvacciramahaṃ bhadanta bhagavan dagdhasantānānāṃ kuśalamūlaparihīnānāmarthāyātibalavegena cārikāṃ caraṃ,
S04bsu018_u:2923: tāvacciraṃ cāhaṃ saṃsāre sattvahetorvividhacaṇḍaghoradāruṇāṃ duḥkhāṃ praticcheyaṃ:
S04bsu018_u:2924_1: gaṅgānadīvāikāsame 'saṃkhyeye 'nupraviṣṭe bhadrake mahākalpe yadā jyotipālo māṇavako
S04bsu018_u:2924_2: 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyati krakutsando nāma tathāgato bhaviṣyati tadāhaṃ
S04bsu018_u:2924_3: tasmin samaye āryeṇa prajñācakṣuṣā daśasu dikṣu sahasrabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamāsu
S04bsu018_u:2924_4: lokadhātuṣu pravartitadhārmikaṃ dharmacakraṃ tiṣṭhato yāpayato buddhān bhagavataḥ paśyeyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:2926_1: āryāpavādakā yāvatkumārge vihanyantaḥ mayā saṅkaṭaprāptāḥ prathamamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
S04bsu018_u:2927: mayā te sattvāḥ prathamaṃ dānapāramitāyāṃ samādāpitā yāvatprajñāpāramitāyāṃ niveśitāḥ syurmayā ca teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ tatkuśalamūlabījamanuttare nirvāṇe prakṣiptaṃ syāt,
S04bsu018_u:2929: prajñāpuṇyasaṃbhāre ca niyojitāḥ syustiṣṭhanto yāpayantasteṣu ca buddhakṣetresu buddheṣu bhagavatasūpanītāḥ syuryadānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau vyākaraṇapratilabdhā bhaveyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:2930_0: samādhidhāraṇīkṣāntipratilabdhāśca syurbhūmyavakrāntāśca syurmayā ca te sattvā buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhā
S04bsu018_u:2930_1: praṇidhānaṃ samādāpitāḥ śikṣāpitāśca syuryathārūpaṃ ca te buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhāṃ
S04bsu018_u:2930_2: pratigṛhṇeyuste ca tān ahaṃ tasmin samaye 'nupraviṣṭe bhadrakalpe krakutsande jinasūrya
S04bsu018_u:2930_3: udgate daśasu dikṣu buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsameṣu buddhakṣetreṣu buddhān bhagavataḥ (KpSū 233)
S04bsu018_u:2931: tiṣṭhato yāpayataḥ sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayataḥ paśyeyaṃ;
S04bsu018_u:2938_0: ye ca tasmin samaye dagdhasantānāḥ sattvā akuśalamūlasamavadhānagatā dṛṣṭimārgasaṃpratipannā
S04bsu018_u:2938_1: ānantaryakārakāḥ kumārgavihanyamānāsteṣāṃ mahāsaṅkaṭaprāptānāṃ sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayeyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:2940: astāṃgate jinasūrye tadāhamanābhogena buddhakāryaṃ kuryāṃ yāvadvarṣaśatāyuṣkāyāṃ prajāyāṃ triṣu puṇyakriyāvastuṣu sattvānniyojayeyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:2941: tasmiṃśca kāle 'tikrānte devalokaṃ gatvā devānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayeyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:2947_0: amātṛjñā apitṛjñā aśrāmaṇyā abrāhmaṇyā akṛtyakarā apuṇyakarā aparalokabhayadarśino
S04bsu018_u:2947_2: abhiyuktāstriṣu duścariteṣu anabhiyuktā daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu abhiyuktā daśasvakuśaleṣu
S04bsu018_u:2948_3: muṣṭasmṛtayaḥ kuśalajugupsakā duḥprajñā alpaśrutā duḥśīlāḥ kuhakā matsariṇaḥ parasparābhāṣakā
S04bsu018_u:2948_5: garbhāśayasmṛtipraṇaṣṭā vividharogapahatāḥ kliṣṭā durvarṇā avahoṭimakā ahrīkā anapatrāpyāḥ
S04bsu018_u:2949: ekapūrvabhaktena bahukāyavācā manasā duścaritaṃ samācaranti te praśaṃsitaśāśvatadṛṣṭikāḥ sattvā bhaviṣyanti /
S04bsu018_u:2950_1: vihiṃsācittāḥ kaluṣacittā rukṣacittāḥ kṣubhitacittā adāntacittā ahitacittā uddhatacittā
S04bsu018_u:2950_3: dharmavivarjitacittā avipakvacittā dharmeṣu sārambhacittā akuśala utpāditacittāḥ
S04bsu018_u:2951: sarvaparigrahamātsaryacittā akṛtajñacittāḥ paradārākramaṇacittā vyāpādavihiṃsanacittā apraṇidhānacittāḥ sattvāstatkāle
S04bsu018_u:2954_0: narakaśabdastiryagyoniśabdo yamalokaśabdo vyādhiśabdo jarāśabdo maraṇaśabdo vadhakaśabdo
S04bsu018_u:2954_3: kāmamithyācāraśabdo mṛṣāvādaśabda utpātaśabdaḥ paiśunyaśabdaḥ paruṣaśabdaḥ saṃbhinnapralāpaśabda
S04bsu018_u:2957: evaṃrūpaiḥ parihīṇakuśalamūlaiḥ parihīṇakalyāṇamitrairduṣṭacittaiḥ sattvaistasmin kāle sahālokadhāturākīrṇā bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu018_u:2958_1: āryāṣṭāṅgena mārgeṇa virahitāstamastamaḥparāyaṇāḥ pragāḍhakarmapratyayena te sattvāstasmin
S04bsu018_u:2959: teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ karmapratyayena sahabuddhakṣetraṃ hīnaṃ bhaviṣyati,
S04bsu018_u:2966: tathārūpāḥ pṛthivyāṃ śaṣpauṣadhitṛṇavṛkṣā patrapuṣpaphalā dhānyarasāḥ sattvānāmannapānabhogaparibhogaviṣamāḥ (KpSū 238)
S04bsu018_u:2968: te sattvāḥ paribhaktyā bhūyasyā mātrayā rukṣā duṣṭāścaṇḍā raudrāḥ paruṣāḥ kadaryāḥ paribhāṣakā anyonyāgauravā bhītena cittenāghātacittā
S04bsu018_u:2970: māṃsabhojanarudhirāhārā mṛgacarmaprāvaraṇāḥ praharaṇādhiṣṭhānāḥ prāṇivadhodyuktā rūpakulavaṃśaiśvaryaśāstralipyaśvārohaṇadhanurgrahāyudhaparivārā mātsaryadarpitā bhaviṣyanti;
S04bsu018_u:2972: tatkālamahaṃ tuṣitabhavanādavatīrya viśiṣṭe cakravartikulavaṃśe īśvare rājakule agramahiṣyāḥ kukṣau vaineyasattvakuśalamūlaparipācanārthaṃ garbhavāsamupagṛhṇīyāṃ;
S04bsu018_u:2973: sarvāvantaṃ tasmin samaye sahe buddhakṣetre udāreṇāvabhāsena sphureyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:2974: ūrdhvaṃ yāvadakaniṣṭhabhavanaparyanto 'haṃ heṣṭhaṃ yāvat kāñcanacakraparyantamudāreṇāvabhāsena sphureyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:2975: ye ca tasmin samaye sattvā sahe buddhakṣetre pratyājātā narakeṣu vā tiryagyonau vā yamaloke vā devamanuṣye (KpSū 239)
S04bsu018_u:2976: vā te sarve tamavabhāsaṃ paśyeyuḥ spṛśeyuḥ saṃjāneyuḥ;
S04bsu018_u:2977: teṣāṃ saṃsāre vimṛśatāṃ duḥkhodvignānāṃ nirvāṇābhilāṣamantaśaḥ kleśaśamacittānyutpādayeyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:2979: yadāhaṃ sarvadharmanayavipaścitaṃ sarvasamādhinirdeśamekadharmamukhamaparāntakalpanirdeśena samāhitacitto daśamāsāṃ mātuḥ kukṣau nivaseyaṃ;
S04bsu018_u:2980: yāvāṃścāhaṃ prāpte buddhatve sattvāṃ parikhinnāṃ saṃsāre parimocayeyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:2981: te sattvā mātuḥ kukṣigataṃ daśamāsāṃ maṇigarbhasaṃdarśanasamāhitacittaṃ paryaṅkena niṣaṇṇaṃ paśyeyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:2982: nirgate ca daśamāse sarvapuṇyasaṃcayenāhaṃ samādhinā sarvāvantaṃ sahabuddhakṣetraṃ ṣaḍvikāraṃ dharaṇīṃ cālayeyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:2983: ūrdhvaṃ yāvadakaniṣṭhabhavanaparyantaṃ heṣṭimena ca yāvat kāñcanacakraparyantaṃ ṣaḍvikāreṇa cālayeyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:2984: ye ca tasmin samaye sahe buddhakṣetre sattvāḥ pratyājātā narakeṣu vā yāvan manuṣyeṣu vā tān prabodhayeyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:2986: punarapi ca sarvāvantaṃ sahaṃ buddhakṣetramudāreṇāvabhāsena aphureyaṃ; (KpSū 240)
S04bsu018_u:2987: tadāpi tasmin samaye sarvān sahe buddhakṣetre sattvān saṃcodayeyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:2990: yadā cāhaṃ caraṇatalena dharaṇīṃ spṛśeyaṃ sarvāvatī tasmin samaye sahe buddhakṣetre ṣaḍvikāraṃ dharaṇīṃ cālayeyaṃ prakaṃpayeyaṃ kṣobhayeyaṃ yāvat kāñcanacakraparyantena;
S04bsu018_u:2991: tadāhaṃ tasmin samaye sattvān jalaniśritāṃ kṣitiniśritāṃ khaniśritāṃ caturyoniparyāpannāṃ pañcagatisaṃniśritāṃ tān sarvān ahaṃ pratibodhayeyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:2994_0: sahajātamātrasya ca me yāvadeva tasmin sahe buddhakṣetre mahābrahmāṇo vā mārā vā
S04bsu018_u:2994_1: śakrā vā candrā vā sūryā vā lokapālā vā mahānāgarājā vāsurendrā vā aupapādukā vā
S04bsu018_u:2994_2: maharddhikā vā yakṣarākṣasanāgāsurā vā sarve mama pūjākarmaṇe upasaṃkrāmeyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:2996: sarvapuṇyasamuccayenāhaṃ samādhinā tathārūpaṃ dharmaṃ deśayeyaṃ yattatsarvāvatī sā parṣattribhiryānaiḥ (KpSū 241)
S04bsu018_u:2998: ye ca tatra parṣadi sattvāḥ śrāvakayānikā bhaveyuste caramabhavikā mama vaineyā bhavikā;
S04bsu018_u:2999: ye ca tatra sattvāḥ pratyekabuddhayānikā bhaveyuste vairocanakusumāṃ kṣāntiṃ pratilabheyuḥ;
S04bsu018_u:3000: ye ca tatra sattvā anuttaramahāyānikā bhaveyuste sarve vajradharasamudrasaṃkopitaṃ samādhiṃ pratilabheran,
S04bsu018_u:3001: tena ca samādhinā tisrā bhūmīḥ samatikrāmeyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:3002: yadahaṃ snāpanamiccheyaṃ ye ca tatra mahānāgarājāno viśiṣṭatarā bhaveyuḥ te māṃ snāpayeyuḥ;
S04bsu018_u:3003: ye ca sattvā māṃ snāpayamānaṃ paśyeyuste sarve tribhiryānairevaṃrūpān guṇānadhigaccheyuḥ yathā proktaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:3004_0: ye ca māṃ sattvā rathamabhirohantaṃ samanupaśyeyurvistareṇa kumārakrīḍavividhaśilpasthānakarmasthānāsanāni
S04bsu018_u:3007: samādhinā tathārūpaṃ dharmaṃ deśayeyaṃ yathā te sattvāstribhiryānaistīvracchandā udyujyeyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:3008: ye ca tatra sattvāḥ pratyekabuddhayānikāste sarve vairocanakusumāṃ kṣāntiṃ pratilabheyuḥ;
S04bsu018_u:3009: yaiśca mahāyānabījaṃ prakṣiptaṃ bhavet te sarve vajradharasamudrasaṃkopitaṃ samādhiṃ pratilabheyustena ca samādhinā tisro bhūmiratikrāmeyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:3010: svayaṃ cāhaṃ tṛṇasaṃstaraṇaṃ gṛhṇīyāṃ bodhivṛkṣamūlavajrāsane prajñapayeyaṃ niṣīdeyaṃ paryaṅkamābadhvā ṛjukena kāyena;
S04bsu018_u:3017: yāvadakaniṣṭhabhavanaparyantena sarve devā ye sahe buddhakṣetre paryāpannāsta upasaṃkrāmeyurmama ca pūjāṃ kurvāṇāḥ,
S04bsu018_u:3019: yaiśca tatra śrāvakayāne bījamavaruptaṃ syātteṣāṃ bhadanta bhagavan kleśavyupaśamāya santāne bhaveyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:3026: ye ca tatra cāturdvīpikāyāmanyatīrthikā lūhatapo vrataduṣkaracārikāṃ caranti,
S04bsu018_u:3029: yathāsmin pradeśe caramabhaviko bodhisattvo duṣkaracārikāṃ carati,
S04bsu018_u:3030: tathārūpaṃ dhyāyati hṛdaye manaskāraṃ badhnāti praśrabdhakāyasaṃskāraḥ praśrabdhavāksaṃskāraḥ praśāntāścāsya praśvāsāśvāsāḥ;
S04bsu018_u:3032: sā duṣkaracaryā maharddhikā sā mahāphalā mahāvistārā,
S04bsu018_u:3035: te ca tāṃ duṣkaracaryāmutsṛjya mama duṣkaracaryāṃ dṛṣṭvā yeṣāṃ śrāvakayānasantānabījāṅkuraṃ pratiṣṭhitaṃ syāt,
S04bsu018_u:3038: vā bhaṭṭā vā naigamajānapadā gṛhasthapravrajitā gṛhāgārasaṃpannāste 'pi mama duṣkaracaryāmupasaṃkrāmeyuryāvacchrāvakayānikā yathā pūrvoktaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:3040: sa tasya paścimako mātṛgrāmapratilābho bhaved iti,
S04bsu018_u:3042: ye mṛgapakṣiṇo duṣkaraṃ caramāṇaṃ niṣaṇṇaṃ paśyeyussa teṣāṃ paścimakastiryagyonipratilābho bhaved iti;
S04bsu018_u:3043: yaiśca mṛgapakṣibhiḥ śrāvakayāne bījānyavaropitāni tenaikajātipratibaddhā mama caiva vaineyā bhaveyurye pratyekabuddhayānā yāvad yathā pūrvoktaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:3045: evaṃ pretā vaktavyāstāvacciraṃ cāhamevaṃrūpāṃ duṣkaracaryāṃ careyaṃ ekaparyaṅkena yāvad bahusattvakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi duṣkaracaryāyāṃ sākṣibhūtā bhaveyuḥ āścaryaprāptāśca,
S04bsu018_u:3047_0: tathārūpāmahaṃ duṣkaracaryāṃ careyaṃ yathā na pūrvaṃ kenacit sattvasaṃkhyātena anyatīrthikena
S04bsu018_u:3047_1: vā śrāvakayānikena vā pratyekabuddhayānikena vā anuttaramahāyānikena vā evaṃ duṣkaracaryācīrṇapūrvaḥ syāt;
S04bsu018_u:3048: na ca punaḥ paścāt kaścit sattvasaṃkhyātaścaret anyatīrthikā vā evaṃrūpāṃ duṣkaracārikāṃ (KpSū 245)
S04bsu018_u:3050: aprāptāyāmanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau tadāhaṃ puruṣakāraṃ kuryāṃ sabalakāyaṃ māraṃ parājayeyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:3055: tathā dvitīyasya tathā tṛtīyasya tathā caturthasya dharmaṃ deśayeyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:3062: vajramayāṃśca sattvānāṃ santāne kleśaparvatāṃ jñānavajreṇa bhindyāṃ triyānena vyavasthānena dharmaṃ deśayeyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:3063: ekasattvasyārthāyāhaṃ bahuyojanaśatāni padbhyāṃ gaccheyaṃ dharmadeśanārthamabhayapade pratiṣṭhāpanārthaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:3065: durbalasya muṣṭasmṛteḥ vibhrāntacittasya mukharapragalbhacittasya praduṣṭacittasya duḥprajñacittasya bahukleśākulacittasya mātṛgrāmasya mama śāsane pravrajyopasaṃpadbhavet /
S04bsu018_u:3067: bahujanaprabhūtaṃ me śāsanaṃ bhavet devānāṃ satyadarśanaṃ yakṣāṇāṃ nāgānāmasurāṇāmāryāṣṭāṅgasamanvāgata upoṣadhavāsaḥ,
S04bsu018_u:3069: bodhiprāptasya ca me bhadanta bhagavan ye sattvā mama praduṣṭacittā vadhakacittāḥ śastreṇa vāgninā vā śaktyā va vividhena vā praharaṇenopasaṃkrāmeyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:3073: yathā bodhiprāptasya me sattvāḥ pūrvaṃ vaireṇa vadhakopakaraṇaprayogena paruṣavacanavividhapraharaṇaviṣānnapānasaṃsṛṣṭenopasaṃkrāmeyuḥ rudhiraṃ ca me utpādayeyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:3074: teṣāṃ sattvānāmahaṃ śīlaśrutasamādhimahākaruṇābhāvitena brahmasvaraghoṣadundubhinarditena svareṇa tathārūpaṃ dharmaṃ deśayeyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:3075: yatteṣāṃ cittāni prasādayeyaṃ kuśale ca niyojayeyaṃ;
S04bsu018_u:3078: na ca teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ svarge mokṣaphale vairāgye āśravakṣaye vā āvaraṇakarma bhaved iti,
S04bsu018_u:3080_0: bodhiprāptasya ca me bhadanta bhagavan yāvanto mama romakūpā bhaveyustāvanto divasaṃ
S04bsu018_u:3083: ye cāpi teṣu buddhakṣetreṣvānantaryakārakāḥ sattvā bhaveyuḥ saddharmapratikṣepakāḥ āryāpavādakā yāvadakuśalamūlasamavadhānakāḥ,
S04bsu018_u:3084_0: ye 'pi tatra sattvāḥ śrāvakayānasaṃprasthitāḥ pratyekabuddhayānasaṃprasthitā mahāyānasaṃprasthitāḥ
S04bsu018_u:3084_1: śikṣāyāṃ kalmāṣakāriṇaḥ chidracāriṇaḥ mūlāpattimāpannāḥ dagdhasantānāḥ śubhamārgapraṇaṣṭāḥ
S04bsu018_u:3087: ye sattvā maheśvarabhaktikāsteṣāṃ sattvānāṃ maheśvararūpeṇa dharmaṃ deśayeyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:3088: sahe ca buddhakṣetre mama varṇaṃ bhāṣayeyustatra ca sattvānāṃ praṇidhānamudyojayeyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:3089: te ca sattvā mama varṇaṃ śrutvā mamaiva buddhakṣetre praṇidhānaṃ kurvīran,
S04bsu018_u:3091: yādyahaṃ bhadanta bhagavan teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ maraṇakālasamaye purataḥ na tiṣṭheyaṃ dharmaṃ na deśayeyaṃ cittaṃ na saṃprasādayeyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:3093: yadi me sattvāḥ kālaṃ kṛtvā durgatīṣūpapadyeyurna ca mama buddhakṣetre manuṣyapratilābhaṃ labheyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:3094: sarve mama dharmā saṃmoṣaṃ gaccheyurmā ca me pratibhāyeyurmā cāhaṃ śakyaṃ sakalaṃ buddhakāryaṃ niṣpādayituṃ /
S04bsu018_u:3095: ye sattvā nārāyaṇabhaktikā yāvatte sattvāḥ kālaṃ kṛtvā durgatiṃ prapateyustanmā cāhaṃ śakyaṃ sakalaṃ buddhakāryaṃ niṣpādayituṃ /
S04bsu018_u:3096: bodhiprāptasya ca me sarvabuddhakṣetreṣu sattvā ānantaryakārakā yāvat kumārge vihanyamānā mahāsaṅkaṭaprāptāḥ sattvāḥ kālaṃ kṛtvā mama buddhakṣetra upapadyeran,
S04bsu018_u:3097: idaṃ teṣāṃ nimittaṃ pāṃśuvarṇāste sattvā bhaviṣyanti, (KpSū 249)
S04bsu018_u:3098: piśācamukhī muṣṭasmṛtayo durgandhā duḥśīlā alpāyuṣkā vividharogopahatā vividhapariṣkāraparihīṇāśca te sattvā bhaviṣyanti;
S04bsu018_u:3099: teṣām sattvānāmarthe 'haṃ yāvattasmin samaye sahe lokadhātau cāturdvīpikā bhaveyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:3100: sarvatra ca cāturdvīpikāyāṃ saṃtuṣitabhavanāvataraṇaṃ māturgarbhe cāhaṃ jātumupadarśayeyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:3105: ye sattvāḥ śrāvakayānikāste śrāvakayānakathāpiṭakaṃ dharmaṃ deśitamājānīyuḥ;
S04bsu018_u:3106: ye sattvāḥ pratyekabuddhavaineyāste pratyekabuddhayānakathādharmaṃ deśitamājānīyurye sattvā anuttaramahāyānikāste 'nuttaramahāyānakathādharmaṃ deśitamājānīyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:3107: ye sattvāḥ saṃbhāravirahitāste dānakathādharmaṃ deśitamājānīyurye sattvāḥ puṇyavirahitāḥ sukhasvargābhilāṣināste śīlakathādharmaṃ deśitamājānīyuḥ;
S04bsu018_u:3114: ye ca sattvā mahāyānikauddhatyavyākulacittopagatāste ānāpānasmṛtivyāhāreṇa dharmaṃ deśitamājānīyuḥ;
S04bsu018_u:3115: ye duḥprajñā vā pradīpapratītyasamutpādavyāhāreṇa dharmaṃ deśitamājānīyuḥ;
S04bsu018_u:3118: vitarkasamudācāropahatā animittavyāhāreṇa dharmaṃ deśitāmājānīyurapraṇihitāpariśuddhopahatā apraṇihitavyāhāreṇa dharmaṃ deśitamājānīyuḥ;
S04bsu018_u:3203_0: ye bodhisattvā aśaṭhā amāyāvino ṛjukā ṛjuka jātīyāśca teṣāṃ caturaśītidharmamukhasahasrāṇi
S04bsu018_u:3203_2: mahāyānasaṃprasthitānāṃ ekapadavyāhāreṇa ime guṇāḥ santāne pratiṣṭhāpayeyaṃ; (KpSū 257)
S04bsu018_u:3243: apramāṇāsaṃkhyeyānāṃ mahāyānasaṃprasthitānāṃ sattvānāmekapadavyāhāreṇāhaṃ mahatā kuśalaviśodhanasaṃnicayena saṃtarpayeyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:3247_0: ye 'pi te bhadanta bhagavan sattvā bhaveyuranyeṣu lokadhātuṣvānantaryakārakā yāvanmūlāpattisāparādhikā
S04bsu018_u:3247_1: dagdhasantānāḥ śrāvakayānikā vā pratyekabuddhayānikā vā anuttaramahāyānikā vā praṇidhānavaśena
S04bsu018_u:3249: krūrakhaṭuṅkasantānā viparītabuddhaya āgṛhītasantānāḥ teṣāṃ cāhaṃ caturaśītiścittarutasahasrāṃ deśayeyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:3250: yāvat kuśīdacittānāṃ sattvānāmahaṃ caturaśītidharmaskandhasahasrāṇi vistareṇa deśayeyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:3251: ye ca tatra sattvā anuttaramahāyānikā bhaveyuḥ teṣāṃ cāhaṃ vistareṇa ṣaṭpāramitādharmaṃ deśayeyaṃ,

S04bsu018_u:3253: ye ca punastatra sattvāḥ śrāvakayānikā vā pratyekabuddhayānikā vā bhaveyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:3264: yeṣāṃ ca sattvānāṃ sarvapañcadoṣā bhaveyustāṃ pañcadoṣavairamaṇyopāsakasaṃvare vyavasthāpayeyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:3265: ye sattvā anabhiratāḥ kuśaleṣu dharmeṣu tāṃścāhaṃ rātriṃdivasamaṣṭāṅge śīle pratiṣṭhāpayeyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:3268: ye sattvāḥ kuśalān dharmān paryeṣṭukāmāstānapyahaṃ kuśaleṣu dharmeṣu samādāpya sakale brahmacaryavāse pratiṣṭhāpayeyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:3269: evaṃrūpānāmānantaryakārakānāṃ yāvad āgṛhītasantānānāṃ sattvānāmarthe cāhaṃ bahuvividhanānārthapadavyañjanaprātihāryairdharmaṃ deśayeyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:3271: kuśale kṣeme śive śānte 'bhayapure nirvāṇe pratiṣṭhāpayeyaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:3272: evamahaṃ caturṇāṃ parṣadāṃ bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayeyaṃ;
S04bsu018_u:3273: ye ca vādārthino bhaveyusteṣāṃ ahaṃ dharmavādaśāstraṃ prakāśayeyaṃ;
S04bsu018_u:3274: ye ca nābhiratāḥ kuśaleṣu dharmeṣu teṣāṃ cāhaṃ (KpSū 262)
S04bsu018_u:3285: ye ca sattvā mama parinirvṛtasya śarīreṣu pūjautsukyamāpadyeyū ratnairyāvadvādyairantaśa ekabuddhanāmaikavandanā ekapradakṣinīkaraṇena ekāñjalikarmaṇā ekapuṣpeṇa pūjāṃ kurvīran,
S04bsu018_u:3287: ye ca sattvā mama parinirvṛtasya śāsane 'ntaśa ekaśikṣāpadamapi gṛhṇīyuryathoktaṃ samādāya varteyuryāvaccatuṣpadagāthāṃ paryavāpnuyurvācayeyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:3290: vā prasādayeyurdharmabhāṇakasya vā pūjāṃ kuryurantaśa ekapuṣpeṇāpi ekavandanenāpi,
