S04bsu018_u:3292_2: ratnadurbhikṣaṃ bhavet tasmin samaye ketumatirnāma maṇivaiḍuryamayaṃ agninirbhāsaṃ tiṣṭhet /
S04bsu018_u:3293: tacca tato 'bhyudgamyorddhvaṃ yāvadakaniṣṭhabhavane sthitvā vividhāṃ puṣpavṛṣṭiṃ pravarṣet,
S04bsu018_u:3296_0: tataśca puṣpavarṣādvividhā śabdā niścareyustadyathā buddhaśabdo dharmaśabdaḥ saṅghaśabda
S04bsu018_u:3301: sarvakuśaleṣu dharmeṣu mahāsattvā ajugupsanīyāste tato 'vatareyuḥ sarve sahe lokadhātau manuṣyāṃ daśakuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu niyojayeyuḥ pratiṣṭhāpayeyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:3302: evameva sarve kāmāvacarā devāḥ śṛṇuyusteṣāṃ ca tṛṣṇāsaṃyojanaratikrīḍāsaumanasyābhiratāṃścittacaitasikāṃ sarvān praśrambhayeyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:3304: te ca devalokādavatīrya sarve sahe lokadhātau manuṣyāṃ daśakuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu samādāpayeyuḥ pratiṣṭhāpayeyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:3305: te ca puṣpā ākāśe vividhā ratnāḥ prādurbhaveyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:3307: sarve sahe buddhakṣetre evaṃrūpāṃ ratnavṛṣṭiṃ abhipravarṣeyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:3308: sarve ca sahe buddhakṣetre kalikalahavivādadurbhikṣarogaparacakraparuṣavāgrukṣaviṣaṃ sarveṇa sarvaṃ praśameyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:3309: kṣemārogyā akalahābandhanavigrahāḥ subhikṣāḥ sarve sahe buddhakṣetre saṃsthiheyuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:3310_0: (KpSū 266) yāni ca sattvāni tāni ratnāni paśyeyuḥ spṛśyeyuḥ upabhogakarma vā kurvīran
S04bsu018_u:3310_1: te sarve tribhiryānairavaivartyā bhaveyuste ca punaradho yāvat kāñcanacakre sthiheyurevameva
S04bsu018_u:3310_2: bhadanta bhagavan śastrāntarakalpakāle samaye punasta indranīlamaṇiratnāḥ saṃsthiheyurūrdhvaṃ

S04bsu018_u:3316: yathā bhadrake mahākalpe mama parinirvṛtasya śarīrāstṛkāryaṃ kuryuḥ,

S04bsu018_u:3322_0: ye ca punaḥ parinirvṛtasya śarīravikurvaṇenāpi sattvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
S04bsu018_u:3322_2: dikṣvaprameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhā
S04bsu018_u:3322_3: mama varṇaṃ bhāṣyayeyuḥ śrāvayeyurghoṣaṃ codīrayeyu“ryacciraṃ bhadrako nāma kalpo babhūva,

S04bsu018_u:3329: ye ca sattvā bodhyarthikāsteṣāṃ tathāgatānāṃ sakāśe mama varṇakīrtiyaśaśca śṛṇuyuste taṃ tathāgataṃ pṛccheyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:3330: “kamarthavaśaṃ sampaśyamānaḥ sa bhagavāṃstathāgata evaṃ pañcakaṣāye kaliyuge vartamāne 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ?
S04bsu018_u:3331_0: ” te ca tathāgatāsteṣāṃ bodhyarthikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ vā imaṃ mama mahākaruṇāsamanvāgataṃ
S04bsu018_u:3331_1: prathamacittotpādaṃ buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhaṃ praṇidhānapūrvayogaṃ ca bhāṣeyuste ca

S04bsu018_u:3331_3: bhaveyuste 'pyevaṃrūpāṃ mahākaruṇāṃ sattveṣūtpādayeyurevaṃrūpaṃ ca praṇidhānaṃ kurvīran,

S04bsu018_u:3333_0: pratigṛhṇīyuste ca buddhā bhagavantastān mahākaruṇāsamanvāgatāṃ bodhyarthikāṃ kulaputrān
S04bsu018_u:3333_1: vā kuladuhitṝn vā evaṃrūpeṇa vyākareṇana vyākuryuryathābhiprāyāṃ taiḥ kulaputraiḥ

S04bsu018_u:4597: śrutvā ca rājñāmbareṇa paramaprītimanasā svayameva brāhmaṇaṃ snāpayitvā paṭṭaṃ badhvā rājābhiṣekenābhiṣicya rājatve pratiṣṭhāpayitvā sarvaṃ jambūdvīpaṃ niryātayitvā,

S04bsu018_u:4610: (KpSū 380) tatra drāṣṭāvo nāma brāhmaṇastena me ubhe netre yācite,
S04bsu018_u:4611: tasya ca mayā ubhe netre utpādya datte,
S04bsu018_u:4614: na cireṇa saracchighoṣo nāma brāhmaṇastena me ubhau karṇau yācitau,
S04bsu018_u:4615: svayameva tasya mayā karṇau chitvā dattau,
S04bsu018_u:4624: aparaśca kṣīraso nāma parivrājakastena ca me ubhau hastau yācitau,
S04bsu018_u:4625: svayameva ca mayā dakṣiṇena hastena vāmaṃ hastaṃ chitvā dakṣiṇaṃ chedāpayitvā datto,
S04bsu018_u:4627: yadā cāṅgapratyaṅgāni chinnāni tadā ca mayā rudhiramrakṣitena kāyena praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:4633: te māṃ gṛhītvā bahirnagaraśmaśānabhūmau choritvā prakāntāḥ /

S04bsu018_u:4644: anupūrveṇa yāvadyojanaśatasahasramuccatvena kāyaḥ saṃvardhatu pañcayojanasahasraṃ vistāreṇa /

S04bsu018_u:4646_0: yāvabhyaśca mayā jihvāḥ parityaktā yā mṛgapakṣibhiḥ paribhaktāḥ praṇidhānavaśena
S04bsu018_u:4646_1: cānyonyāḥ prādurbhūtāḥ teṣāṃ ayaṃ gṛdhrakūṭaparvatapramāṇo rāśiḥ syānnityaṃ cānuttarāprabhūtājihvatālakṣaṇapratilābhāya
S04bsu018_u:4647: tatrāhaṃ cyutvā rūḍhavaḍe jambūdvīpe pūrvapraṇidhānena nāgeṣūpapanno nidhisaṃdarśano nāma nāgarājā babhūva /
S04bsu018_u:4648: yāmeva rātriṃ nāgeṣūpapannastāmeva rātriṃ nidhikoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi nidhānānāṃ saṃdarśitāni svayameva ghoṣaṃ cārayāmi /
S04bsu018_u:4652: gṛhītvā bhoḥ sattvā daśakuśalān karmapathān samādāya vartadhvaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:4656: tatra ca rūḍhavaḍe jambūdvīpe saptanāgajanmaparivartena saptasaptavarṣakoṭīnayutaśatasahasreṣvaprameyāsaṃkhyeyā nidhayo nirdarśitāśca pradattāśca /
S04bsu018_u:4661: evaṃ dvitīye dvīpe saptabhirnāgajanmaparivartairevaṃrūpaṃ puruṣakāraṃ kṛtavān /
S04bsu018_u:4662: evaṃ tritīye yāvatsarvatra vijitadoṣāyāṃ lokadhātau sarveṣu dvīpeṣu evaṃrūpaḥ puruṣakāraḥ kṛtaḥ /
S04bsu018_u:4663: evameva daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālikāsamesu śūnyeṣu pañcakaṣāyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu,
S04bsu018_u:4664: ekaikasmin dvīpe evaṃrūpāḥ saptanāgajanmaparivarteṣu mayā yāvat saptasaptavarṣakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrairevamaprameyāsaṃkhyeyā nidhayaḥ sattvānāṃ pradattā,
S04bsu018_u:4669: ye bodhisattvā evaṃrūpāṃ tīvrabalavīryeṇa bodhicārikāṃ cīrṇavantaḥ,
S04bsu018_u:4671: na ca punaḥ kaścit paścādbhaviṣyati bodhisattvo ya evaṃ tīvreṇodyogabalavegenānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cārikāṃ caret,
S04bsu018_u:4673: tadā cāsaṃkhyeyānāṃ kalpānāmatyayena pratyavarakālasamayenedaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ pravāḍodupānirnāma babhūva /
S04bsu018_u:4674: śūnye pañcakaṣāye utpale mahākalpe vartamāne 'syāṃ cāturdvīpikāyāmahaṃ śakro 'bhūvan savirocano nāma /
S04bsu018_u:4676: dṛṣṭvā cāhaṃ paramabhīṣaṇakaṃ yakṣarūpamātmānamabhinirmāyāsmiṃ jambūdvīpe 'vatīrya manuṣyāṇāṃ purataḥ pratyasthāṃ /

S04bsu018_u:4687: anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādayanti pratyekabuddhayānena vā śrāvakayānena (KpSū 385)
S04bsu018_u:4689: tatra ca me sattvā nirmitakāḥ paribhūktāyāṃ dṛṣṭvā te sattvā bhayena yāvajjīvaṃ prāṇātipātātprativiratā adattādānādyāvan mithyādṛṣṭeḥ prativiratāḥ /
S04bsu018_u:4692: sarve cāturdvīpikāḥ sattvā daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu triṣu ca yāneṣu pratiṣṭhāpitāstatra mayā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:4695: yathā ca me cāturdvīpikāḥ sattvāḥ kuśale mārge niyojitā /
S04bsu018_u:4696: evameva sarvatrāsmiṃ buddhakṣetre sarvacāturdvīpikeṣu sattvāḥ evaṃrūpeṇa bhayena māṃ paśyeyuḥ,
S04bsu018_u:4699: evameva samantāddaśasu dikṣu śūnyeṣu pañcakaṣāyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu sattvāṃ daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpayeyaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:4701: evameva me kulaputra āśā praṇidhiśca paripūrṇaḥ sarvatra pravāḍodupānāyāṃ lokadhātau manuṣyā yakṣarūpeṇa vinītāḥ kuśaleṣu dharmeṣu /

S04bsu018_u:4705: tena karmāvaśeṣeṇa mamaitarhi bodhivṛkṣamūle vajrāsane niṣaṇṇasya bodhimabhisaṃbodhukāmasya māraḥ pāpīyāṃ mahāsainyenopasaṃkrānto bodhau vyākṣepakaraṇārthaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:4707: bodhicaryāṃ caramāṇasya labdhā cāhaṃ gaṃbhīrāṃ kṣāntiṃ gaṃbhīrāṃ dhāraṇīṃ gaṃbhīrāṃ samādhiṃ pañcalaukikābhijñāḥ pratilabdhāḥ;
S04bsu018_u:4709: evamaprameyāsaṃkhyeyāḥ sattvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpitā niveśitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ /
S04bsu018_u:4716: ekaikasya buddhasyāntike sāgarodakabindupramāṇā mayā guṇāḥ parigṛhītāḥ,
S04bsu018_u:4720: mayā ca kṛpayā pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ caramāṇena svamāṃsarudhireṇa sattvāḥ saṃtarpitā,
S04bsu018_u:4722: iti śrīkaruṇāpuṇḍarīke mahāyānasūtre dānaparivarto nāma pañcamaḥ // 5 //
S04bsu018_u:4724: VI (EPILOGUE) yathāhaṃ kulaputra buddhacakṣuṣā paśyāmi daśasu dikṣu buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamān buddhān bhagavataḥ parinirvṛtān,

S04bsu018_u:4727: evamevaitarhi pūrvasyāṃ diśi aprameyāsaṃkhyeyāste buddhā bhagavantaḥ pravartitadhārmikadharmacakrāḥ tiṣṭhanto yāpayanto dharmaṃ deśayanto 'drakṣaṃ,

S04bsu018_u:4733: mayā sa bhagavān pūrvaṃ prathamamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditaḥ samādāpito niveśitaḥ pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ;
S04bsu018_u:4734: mayā dānapāramitāyāṃ yāvatprajñāpāramitāyāṃ prathamaṃ samādāpitāḥ, peyālaṃ /

S04bsu018_u:4751: etāṃ pūrvaṃgamāṃ kṛtvā kulaputra purimāyāṃ diśyaprameyāsaṃkhyeyān buddhān bhagavatastiṣṭhato yāpayato dharmaṃ deśayato buddhacakṣuṣā paśyāmi /
S04bsu018_u:4752: ye 'nutpāditabodhicittāḥ pūrve 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpitā mayā ca prathamaṃ dānapāramitāyāṃ yāvatprajñāpāramitāyāṃ samādāpitāḥ pratiṣṭhāpitā,
S04bsu018_u:4753: mayā ca prathamaṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ yāpayatāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ sakāśamupanītā yatra taiḥ sarvaprathamaṃ vyākaraṇaṃ pratilabdhaṃ anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau” //
S04bsu018_u:4754: atha tasyāṃ velāyāṃ saṃpuṣpitāyāṃ lokadhātau tasya vimalaguṇatejarājasya tathāgatasyāsanaṃ prakaṃpitaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:4756: tathāgatasyāsanaṃ prakaṃpitaṃ dṛṣṭvā tameva tathāgataṃ pṛṣṭavantaḥ /
S04bsu018_u:4757: “ko bhadanta bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayo yadi idamadṛṣṭapūrvaṃ bhagavata āsanaṃ prakaṃpitam[?“]iti /
S04bsu018_u:4758_0: sa tathāgatastānavocat - “asti kulaputrāḥ paścime digbhāge ito buddhakṣetrādekonanavatibuddhakṣetrānatikramya
S04bsu018_u:4758_1: tatra sahā nāma lokadhātustatra śākyamunirnāma tathāgatastiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati /

S04bsu018_u:4760: tena tathāgatena pūrvaṃ bodhisattvabhūtenānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādapitāḥ,
S04bsu018_u:4762: tena tathāgatenāhaṃ prathamaṃ dānapāramitāyāṃ samādāpito niveśitaḥ pratiṣṭhāpito yāvatprajñāpāramitāyāṃ;
S04bsu018_u:4763: tena tathāgatena pūrvabodhisattvacaryāṃ caratāhaṃ prathamaṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ yāpayatāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ sakāśamupanīto,
S04bsu018_u:4764: yatra me prathamaṃ vyākaraṇaṃ pratilabdhamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /

S04bsu018_u:4766: sa evaṃ caturṇāṃ parṣadāṃ imaṃ pūrvayogamārabhya dharmaṃ deśayati /
S04bsu018_u:4769: madvacanāt sahaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ gantuṃ śākyamunestathāgatasyārogyakauśalyaṃ paripṛcchanāya?” /
S04bsu018_u:4771_0: “]ya iha bhadanta bhagavan saṃpuṣpite buddhakṣetre ṛddhimantaḥ sarvabodhisattvaguṇapāramitāprāptāste
S04bsu018_u:4773: “vayamapi bhadanta bhagavan gamiṣyāmastaṃ sahaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ taṃ śākyamuniṃ vandanāya paryupasanāya taṃ ca sarvajñatākāradhāraṇīmukhapraveśaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śravaṇāya” /
S04bsu018_u:4777: “tāmapi vayaṃ bhadanta bhagavan diśaṃ na jānīmo yatra sahā lokadhātuḥ śākyamunestathāgatasya buddhakṣetraṃ” /
S04bsu018_u:4778: tataḥ sa vimalaguṇatejarājastathāgato bāhuṃ prasārya pañcabhyo 'ṅgulibhyo vividhānyarciṃṣi pramumoca /
S04bsu018_u:4781: yataste bodhisattvāḥ paśyanti sarvāvadimaṃ sahaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ sphuṭaṃ bodhisattvairgaganatale ca devanāgayakṣāsuraiḥ sphuṭaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:4782: dṛṣṭvā ca punaste bodhisattvāstaṃ vimalaguṇatejarājānaṃ tathāgatamevamāhuḥ /
S04bsu018_u:4783: “paśyāmo vayaṃ bhadanta bhagavan sahaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ sarvāvantaṃ sphuṭaṃ,
S04bsu018_u:4784: nāsti tatrāvakāśo 'ntaśo daṇḍanikṣepaṇamātramapi yanna sphuṭaṃ bodhisattvaiḥ /
S04bsu018_u:4785: paśyāmaḥ śākyamunistathāgato 'smān nirīkṣate dharmaṃ ca deśayati” /
S04bsu018_u:4786: sa ca vimalaguṇatejarājastathāgatasteṣāṃ bodhisattvānāmevamāha - “samantacakṣuḥ kulaputrāḥ śākyamunistathāgato /
S04bsu018_u:4787: ye kecit kulaputrāḥ sahe lokadhātau sattvā bhūmisthitā vā antarīkṣasthitā vā tataścaikaikaḥ sattva evaṃ saṃjānāti,
S04bsu018_u:4788: “maṃ śākyamunistathāgataḥ sarvacetasā nirīkṣate mamaikamārabhya dharmaṃ deśayati” /
S04bsu018_u:4789: sarvavarṇaṃśca sa kulaputra śākyamunistathāgato dharmaṃ deśayati ekavarṇasthānaṃ /
S04bsu018_u:4790: (KpSū 394) ye ca tatra kulaputra sattvā brāhmabhaktāste śākyamuniṃ tathāgataṃ brahmāṇaṃ samanupaśyanti,
S04bsu018_u:4799: ye maheśvarabhaktikāste sattvā maheśvararūpavarṇasaṃsthānavacanavyāhāreṇa śākyamuniṃ tathāgataṃ paśyanti dharmaṃ ca śṛṇvanti /
S04bsu018_u:4800: yāvaccaturaśītistatra sattvānāṃ varṇasaṃsthānabhaktirūpavyāhārasahasrāṇi te tathā caiva śākyamuniṃ tathāgataṃ paśyanti dharmaṃ ca śṛṇvanti” /
S04bsu018_u:4801: tasyāṃ ca parṣadi rahagarjito nāma bodhisattvo dvitīyaśca jyotiraśmirnāma bodhisattvaḥ /
S04bsu018_u:4803: “gacchatha yūyaṃ kulaputrāḥ sahe lokadhātau śākyamuniṃ tathāgataṃ madvacanādārogyakauśalyaṃ sukhasparśavihāratāṃ paripṛcchatha” /
S04bsu018_u:4807: na cātraikasattvasyāpyavakāśo 'sti kṣitau gagane vā yatra vayaṃ pratitiṣṭhemaḥ” /
S04bsu018_u:4808: sa ca vimalaguṇatejarājastathāgata āha - “mā kulaputrā evaṃ vadatha,
S04bsu018_u:4818: ekasmiṃ samaye kulaputra śākyamunistathāgato 'cirābhisaṃbuddho vaineyasattvāvekṣayā madhye śailaparvate indrākṣasya yakṣasya bhavane sālaguhāyāṃ viharati,
S04bsu018_u:4821: sarvāvatī ca sā sālaguhā tathāgatakāyena sphuṭā,
S04bsu018_u:4824_0: tasya ca saptāhasyātyayena daśabhir diśābhirdvādaśanayutā bodhisattvānāṃ tatra sahe
S04bsu018_u:4824_1: lokadhātau yastasya parvatasyābhimukhaṃ sthitvā śākyamunestathāgatasya vandanāya
S04bsu018_u:4825: sa ca kulaputra śākyamunistathāgatastatra parśadi ridhyabhisaṃskāramabhisaṃskṛtavān;
S04bsu018_u:4826: sā ca sālaguhā evaṃ vistīrṇā caivaṃ vipulā ca prādurbhūtā,
S04bsu018_u:4827: yadā te dvādaśanayutā bodhisattvānāṃ tatra sālaguhāyāṃ praviṣṭā vistīrṇāvakāśaṃ paśyanti sma /
S04bsu018_u:4828: ekaikaśca bodhisattvastatra tathāgatasya vividhabodhisattvavikurvaṇena pūjāṃ kṛtvā,
S04bsu018_u:4829: ekaiko bodhisattvastatra saptaratnamayāsanaṃ nirmitavān yatropaviṣṭā dharmaṃ śṛṇvanti sma /
S04bsu018_u:4831_0: te ca bodhisattvāstasya śākyamunestathāgatasya sakāśāddharmaṃ śrutvā śākyamunestathāgatasya
S04bsu018_u:4831_1: pādau śirasā vanditvā triṣkṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya svakasvakeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu saṃprasthitāḥ /
S04bsu018_u:4832: aciraprakāntānāṃ ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ sālaguhā yathā paurvāṇāṃ saṃsthitā /
S04bsu018_u:4835: sa caturaśītibhistrayastriṃśaddevasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ yena sālaguhā yena ca bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāmati /
S04bsu018_u:4839: sa ca pañcaśikho madhureṇa svareṇa bhagavantamabhimukhaṃ staviṣyati,
